sections.title: How to Get a Personal Loan with the Lowest Interest Rate in Ranchi

elements.body:
There a few factors that need to be considered when applying for a personal loan in Ranchi. You will have to draft your application in a way where you are able to get a good interest rate from the bank. The interest rate that is offered will depend on the lender who you wish to borrow the sum of money from. Though personal loans are easy to apply for, it is very important that you check your credit score before applying for a loan. A good credit can not only help you get the loan amount that you desire, but also help you avail a good and affordable interest rate on the loan. A credit score that is 750 and above is considered as a good score and this will help you get a better deal on your loan. The interest rate offered by the financial institution that you approach is directly proportional to your credit score which means that a high credit score will avail a lower interest rate and vice-versa.

Another thing to keep in mind when applying for a personal loan is to assess your financial requirements before applying for the loan. If you end up borrowing a high amount that you don't really need, you will end up paying extra money to the bank as interest. Similarly, if you borrow a lower sum, you will end up taking another personal loan to meet your needs which means you will have to pay an interest on another loan amount. Therefore, it is important that you access your needs and see how much financial banking you require to meet your needs to avoid paying any money towards interest that you could have avoided.

sections.title: Salary Requirements to avail Personal Loans in Ranchi

elements.body:
When a bank or NBFC receives an application for a personal loan, there are a few factors that they consider before sanctioning the loan. One of these factors is the individual's salary. The financial institution needs to be certain that the individual can repay the amount. Some of the requirements that need to be met to avail a personal loan are listed below:

  • The age of the applicant should be anywhere between 21 years and 60 years.
  • A salaried individual should have a minimum monthly income of Rs.15,000. This minimum requirement will vary from one bank to another.
  • The applicant should have resided in Ranchi for a minimum of 1 year.
  • The applicant should is required to have a minimum work experience of 2 years.
  • Applicants will be required to submit a couple of documents like bank statements, address proof, identity proof, etc.

items.question: How long will the bank take to approve my application for a personal loan?
items.answer: The time taken to approve an application for a personal loan will depend from bank to bank. While some banks approve loan applications with 48 hours, some banks take at least a week. Usually a loan application is approved between two and seven working days.

items.question: Are there any additional charges associated with a personal loan?
items.answer: Yes, there is. Almost all banks charge a processing fee ranging from 2% to 2.5% of the amount you wish to borrow, and the fee is generally deducted from the amount disbursed to you.

items.question: How do I repay my personal loan?
items.answer: The repayment of personal loans can be done in Equated Monthly Instalments (EMIs) via post-dated cheques favouring the bank from which you have availed the loan. You could also link your debit account to your loan in case you borrow from a bank with which you hold a savings bank account and the amount will be deducted automatically.

items.question: Can I get the balance transfer facility in my personal loan?
items.answer: It depends on the bank. Some banks offer the balance transfer facility if the customer has paid 12 EMIs. Check with your bank before applying for the loan if they offer the same.

items.question: How much money can I borrow through a personal loan?
items.answer: The lender will determine the limit you have when it comes to taking a personal loan. A number of factors will be considered before the bank approves your application, but loans up to Rs.5 lakhs are disbursed by most banks.

items.question: Are there any additional charges that are associated with a personal loan?
items.answer: Yes, there are additional charges. Most banks charge from 2% to 2.5% of the total amount that you wish to borrow. The fee is deducted from the amount that has to be disbursed to you.

items.question: How long will the bank take to approve my application for a personal loan?
items.answer: The time taken to approve and sanction a personal loan will vary from bank to bank. While some banks approve loan applications within 48 hours, there are some banks that take at least a week. Usually a loan application is approved between two and seven working days.

items.question: How do I repay my personal loan?
items.answer: The repayment of a personal loan can be done in the form of Equated Monthly Instalments (EMIs) via post-dated cheques in favour of the bank from which you have availed the loan. You could even link your debit account to your loan if you have taken a loan from a bank where you have a savings bank account. The amount that you need to pay as EMI will automatically get deducted from your savings account.

items.question: Can I get the balance transfer facility in my personal loan?
items.answer: It depends on the bank. There are some banks that offer the balance transfer facility if the customer has made at least 12 EMI payments. You can check with your bank before you apply for the loan.

items.question: Can I receive Tax Benefits on my personal loan?
items.answer: Unless the personal loan is used for a home renovation project, tax benefits are not associated with personal loans. You can, however, avail tax benefits under Section 24 of the Income Tax Act on the interest that is paid on the loan but not on the principal amount that is paid.

sections.title: How do I get a Personal Loan with the lowest interest rate in Thane?

elements.body:
Prior to availing a personal loan, it is imperative for customers to know the components of a personal loan that affect the interest rate - added on the loan amount. Most people leave the assessments and calculations (with regard to the interest rate) to bank executives. If you're new to availing personal loans, listed below are areas you would need to look into if you wish to avail a loan at the lowest possible interest rate.

Credit score: The credit score directly reflects on the interest rate applied on the loan offered to you by the bank. The higher your credit score the lower will be the interest rate offered to you by the bank and vice versa. Having a credit score upwards of 750 is optimum when availing a loan will be beneficial.

Down payment - When availing a personal loan, most people ignore the resultant effect a down payment has on the interest rate offered to them by the bank. Making a down payment north of 20% of the total loan amount will result in you availing a loan at a lower interest rate.

Debt-to-income ratio - Before approving the loan application, one of the first things that banks and NBFCs take into consideration is the debt-to-income ratio of the applicant. Having a debt-to-income ratio below 40% is optimum. Having a debt-to-income ratio more than either 40% or 50% might result in your application being rejected or if approved (based on your income), the interest rate added on the loan will be relatively higher.

Look around for the best loan offer: Rather than just going with the bank holding your salary account, it is important to look around for the bank or NBFC offering a loan that suits your financial ability. Loan shopping on financial portals such as BankBazaar will give you a clear-cut idea of the different interest rates offered by banks and NBFCs. The BankBazaar website compares loans offered by its partner banks and lays bare the best possible loan out there.

Your experience and the company you work for: Working for a reputed company will only increase the bank's trust in you repaying the loan in time. The number of years of experience as well as the company you work for plays an important role in deciding the interest rate added on the loan.

Negotiate: Making a negotiation for the interest rate added on your loan amount is a must. Most people do not even know that this is a possibility. Negotiating with the bank on the interest rate might just get you a better deal.

items.question: What is the maximum personal loan amount one can avail?
items.answer: Salaried individuals can avail loans anything up to Rs.25 lakh. In the case of availing a joint loan, the loan amount will increase as the income of both parties are taken into consideration.

items.question: Are there any foreclosure charges?
items.answer: Banks and NBFCs charge anything between 2-4% of the outstanding amount when the customer makes a foreclosure. That said, in most cases customers can make a foreclosure only 6 months after commencement of the loan.

items.question: How can I calculate the EMI?
items.answer: You can calculate the EMI using online Personal Loan EMI calculator. The BankBazaar EMI calculator is accurate.

items.question: You say the credit score is taken into consideration when one avails a loan. What affects the credit score of an individual?
items.answer: Failure to pay your credit bills and loan dues in time affects the credit score of an individual. A good credit score is anything above 750.

items.question: How can I pay an EMI towards a loan?
items.answer: There are several ways to pay an EMI. You can use your net banking account, credit card, debit card, etc.

items.question: Is there a processing fee applicable to a personal loan?

items.question: How long can I take to repay a personal loan?

items.question: Do salaried individuals have to be of a certain age to avail a personal loan?

sections.title: How to Get a Personal Loan with the Lowest Interest Rate in Vadodara

elements.body:
There are a few important factors that we need to consider when applying for a personal loan so that you are eligible for competitive interest rates. The interest rate that you are eligible for is dependent on the lender from whom you receive the capital amount. The first major step that you will have to follow is determine your creditworthiness. This can be done by visiting the official website of a Credit Information Company. These companies give you an accurate score which plays a major factor in having your loan amount sanctioned.

A good credit score can not only make it easier to acquire a loan amount, but will also provide a number of affordable interest options along with your loan. Credit scores that range from 750 and above is termed as a good score and this makes it considerably easier for you to have a higher loan amount sanctioned to you and at a lower interest rate. It is instrumental that you carefully draft and assess what your financial requirements are going to be so that you don't apply for a loan amount that you do not actually require as you would then have to pay a lot more in interest. Similarly, applying for a loan amount that falls short of fulfilling your financial requirements would mean that you would be forced into applying for another loan to make sure that your needs are met. Therefore, it is very important to make sure that you assess your financial needs to make sure that you do not lose any money by making extra payments as interest.

sections.title: Salary Requirements to avail Personal Loans in Vadodara

elements.body: A lender has a set of requirements that need to be met by potential borrowers if they want to loan sanctioned. Applicants who want to apply for a loan have to either be self-employed or salaried individuals and they must provide ample proof of their salary or income to the bank or lender. This is done to ascertain the legitimacy of the applicant's capability to repay the loan. Salaried employees have to draw a minimum of Rs.10,000 a month to be eligible for a personal loan that comes with full check-off and Rs.15,000 a month for a personal loan that comes with partial/no check-off. Self-employed individuals are required to draw a minimum monthly salary of Rs.20,000 if they are to avail a loan from the bank. These requirements vary with each bank. You can visit the official website of the bank of your choice to check the salary requirement to have a personal loan sanctioned by the bank.

items.question: How long does a bank take to approve an application for a personal loan?
items.answer: The time taken by a bank to approve an application submitted for a personal loan varies from bank to bank. There are some bank that approve applications for a personal loan within 48 hours while there are others banks that take at least a week. On average, a bank can take 6-7 working days to approve a loan. Make sure that your documents are in order to help speed up the loan approval process.

items.question: Are there any additional charges that are associated with a personal loan?
items.answer: Yes, there are. Most banks in Vadodara charge a small processing fee that ranges anywhere between 2% and 2.5% of the loan amount that you intend on borrowing. This fee is generally deducted from the loan amount that is disbursed to you.

items.question: How do I repay my personal loan from Bank of Baroda?
items.answer: The repayment of a personal loan that is applied and sanctioned to residents in Vadodara can be easily made through EMIs using post-dated cheques in favour of the bank that sanctioned the loan. Another way you can repay a loan is by linking your loan to your debit account. The amount will get deducted automatically every month.

items.question: If I miss an EMI payment, what are the charges levied for the same?
items.answer: You will have to pay an amount that amounts to 2% of the loan amount that has been sanctioned. This is charged as a penalty fee for missing a due date on their personal loan.

items.question: What is the maximum amount of money that I can borrow through a personal loan?
items.answer: This is entirely dependent on the lender. The lender will determine your capability to repay a loan by considering various factors like credit score, annual salary, etc. Loans to the tune of Rs.5 lakh is sanctioned by most banks in the Vadodara area.

sections.title: Salary Requirements to Avail Personal Loans in Varanasi

elements.body:
When a bank or NBFC receives an application for a personal loan, there are a few factors that they consider before sanctioning the loan. One of these factors is the individual's salary. The financial institution needs to be certain that the individual can repay the amount. Some of the requirements that need to be met to avail a personal loan are listed below:

  • A salaried individual should have a minimum monthly income of Rs.15,000. This minimum requirement will vary from one bank to another.
  • Applicants will be required to submit a couple of documents like bank statements, address proof, identity proof, etc.
  • The age of the applicant should be anywhere between 21 years and 60 years.
  • The applicant should have resided in Varanasi for a minimum of 1 year.
  • The applicant should is required to have a minimum work experience of 2 years.

items.question: How long does the bank take to approve an application for a personal loan?
items.answer: The time taken for an application to get approved will vary from bank to bank. There are banks that approve an application for a loan within a week and there are some that take 48 hours to do so. A personal loan application generally takes two to seven working days to get approved.

items.question: How is a personal loan repaid?
items.answer: The repayment of a personal loan can be done in the form of Equated Monthly Instalments (EMIs) made through post-dated cheques in favour of the bank that has sanctioned the loan to you. The amount can get deducted automatically if you have linked your debit account to the loan from where you have taken the loan and also where you hold a savings account.

items.question: Are there any additional charges associated with a personal loan?
items.answer: Yes, there is. Most banks charge a processing fee that ranges from 0.5% to 2.5% of the amount that you wish to borrow, and the fee is generally deducted from the amount that is disbursed to you.

items.question: What is the maximum amount that I can avail with a personal loan?
items.answer: The lender or the bank shall determine the limit that you can borrow when it comes to taking out a personal loan. There are a number of factors that are considered by the bank when determining the cap on the loan amount that they can disburse. Most banks offer a sum of Rs.25 lakhs to Rs.30 lakhs.

items.question: Can I avail the balance transfer facility with my personal loan?
items.answer: This is entirely dependent on the bank from which you have borrowed the sum. There are some banks that offer the balance transfer facility if the borrower has made 12 or more EMIs. You can check with the bank if this facility is available at the time of applying for the loan.

sections.title: Personal Loans in Vijayawada

elements.body:
Personal loan also known as unsecured loan is a type of loan that is availed by a borrower from a bank or a financial institution to meet their personal expenses. Customers avail personal loans to pay for wedding-related expenses, pursue further education, clear off existing debts, or to help a loved one who is in a financial crisis. Personal loans attract high interest rate as unlike a home loan or a car loan, a personal loan is not backed by a collateral. In the bank's eyes, a personal loan is risky as the only way to collect the funds back from the customer is to expect that they pay the agreed EMI on time.

EMI stands for Equated Monthly Instalments. This is the amount that a borrower agrees to pay to the lender towards the repayment of the loan taken. The EMI amount is calculated by dividing the total loan amount taken by the borrower, plus charges if any, and the total interest payable by the number of months the loan is taken for.

sections.title: Personal Loans offered by various banks in Vijayawada

elements.body:
There are many leading banks that offer personal loans in Vijayawada. Some of the banks and financial institutions are:

  • Fullerton

sections.title: How do I get a Personal Loan with the lowest interest rate in Vijayawada?

elements.body:
The interest rate that you pay on your personal loan is decided by the lender. Although the decision is taken by the lender, there are few things a borrowers can do to ensure they get low interest rates. Some of the steps you can take to avail a personal loan with low interest rate are:

Employer-bank relationship: When you are applying for a personal loan, please check if your employer is tied-up with any bank. Usually, employers request banks to roll out offers on a personal loan for their employees.

Display creditworthiness: Creditworthiness depends on the credit history of the borrower. If the borrower has paid their bills on time without defaulting in the past, they will be considered to be credit-worthy is the bank's eyes. To display your creditworthiness, please pay your bills on time, do not default on your loans, and don't use your credit card to the brim.

Shop online: Most people approach the bank they are transacting with if they are in need of a personal loan. However, if you want to avail a personal loan at the lowest interest rate, shop online. When you compare various personal loans online, you will get to know about the best deal available for you in the market. Many third-party websites like BankBazaar allows you to compare various personal loans available in the market.

Check for pre-approved loans: From time to time, banks give pre-approved personal loans to their customers. As the name suggests pre-approved loans mean that the bank has already approved the loan for you and all you have to do is to apply for it. As these kind of loans is given to selected account holders, banks give exciting discount on the interest rate.

Reduce your debts: When you submit a loan application to the bank, they check if you have any existing debts. Try to avoid huge debts when applying for a personal loan. Make sure you have a good debt-to-income ratio. Debt-to-income ratio indicates the total amount of debt you have and the income you earn. Always make sure that you have less than 10% of your income as debt. The lesser the debt, the better.

items.question: Should I pay a penalty if I choose to prepay the personal loan earlier that agreed?
items.answer: Banks may charge you a prepayment fee if you close the personal loan before the agreed loan term. However, the prepayment rules differ from one bank to another. Please check with your lender about prepayment options.

items.question: Can I apply for a personal loan if I'm unemployed for the last 8 months?
items.answer: Usually, banks ask you to submit last 6 months bank statements and 3 months' salary slip to approve your personal loan. You may not qualify for a personal loan if you do not have a regular source of income.

elements.body:
Visakhapatnam, also known as "Vizag”, is a port city on the southeast coast of India in the state of Andhra Pradesh. It is often called "The Jewel of the East Coast" and the "City of Destiny". The city is home for various state owned heavy industries and a steel plants. Apart from accommodating various international information technologies and banking firms, the city is a hub for iron ore and other minerals which are exported to China and other countries. The fishing and real estate industry has seen a tremendous growth.The city has a population of over 1 million, is the second largest city in the state of Andhra Pradesh and the third largest city on the east coast of India. Visakhapatnam has been recognised as a Global City of the Future by McKinsey Quarterly.

A personal loan is a kind of unsecured loan which can be used for any purpose that the borrower deems necessary. An unsecured loan is an umbrella term used for loans which do not require collateral. Banks, credit unions, and other financial institutions offer personal loans on an ongoing basis.

sections.title: How do I get a personal loan with the lowest interest rate in Visakhapatnam?

elements.body:
The interest rate is usually high for personal loans. In a long run, the lower the interest rate, the better. So, when you avail a personal loan, make sure you have a low interest rate as it will directly affect the EMI amount you are going to pay every month. The interest rate on your personal loan is determined by various factors. Before applying for a personal loan, you can make sure you have done the following things which will help you get a better interest rate on your loan:

  • Improve your credit score: The first thing a lender will see when you apply for a personal loan is your credit score. A credit score is a numerical expression that represents the creditworthiness of the borrower. Credit bureaus in India assign a credit score for every individual. The credit score is assigned based on your repayment history, your existing loans, and other factors. A credit score can range from 300 and 850. The higher the credit score, the higher your chances of getting a good deal on your personal loan. Before applying for a personal loan, make sure you know your credit score. If you do not have a decent credit score, make sure you close your existing loans if possible, clear your credit card bills, and avoid cheque bonuses and late payments.
  • Get a co-signer: Ask a friend or your family member who has a high credit score to co-sign on your personal loan. This makes the loan less risky for the lender and will result in lower interest rates for you.
  • Shop around for loans: Spend ample time to know more about the personal loans available in the market. Make sure you research for a maximum of 2 weeks period. When you shop for a long time, you might lose out on the best offers on personal loans.
  • Make a down payment: Please remember it is advisable to make high down payment. Making high down payment is sure to get a better interest rate on your loan. Anything more than 30% of your personal loan amount is a good down payment and will affect the interest rate positively.
  • Debt-to-income ratio: Debt-to-income ratio is the ratio of your total debt and you're the sum total of your income. If you have a right debt to income ratio in your portfolio, banks will be willing to offer you a low interest rate on your personal loans.
  • Tenure of your personal loan: The tenure you choose while availing a personal loan affects the interest rate you get. The longer your loan term, the higher your interest rate. Please choose a short tenure period even if it increases your EMI amount.

items.question: What is a personal loan EMI calculator?
items.answer: Personal loan EMI calculator is an online tool that helps you calculate the monthly instalments you will pay towards your personal loan. You can use the personal loan EMI calculator available on the BankBazaar website.

elements.body: The American Express Platinum Travel Credit Card is an ideal credit card for frequent travellers. The credit card provides a wide range of travel benefits and privileges that will make your trips more interesting and rewarding. Let's explore the features and benefits offered by the card in detail.

sections.title: Features And Benefits Of American Express Platinum Travel Credit Card

elements.body:
American Express Platinum Travel Credit Card has plenty to offer to its cardholders.

  • Welcome bonus: Welcome gift includes 5,000 Milestone Bonus Membership Rewards Points redeemable for travel vouchers worth Rs.4,000.

The reward points will be credited only when the annual fee is paid and when the cumulative spends within the first 60 days of card issuance reach Rs.5,000.

  • Spend based rewards: On spends of Rs.1.90 lakh in a year, you can avail travel vouchers worth over Rs.7,700.

On spending Rs.4 lakh in a year, you can earn Taj Experiences Gift Cards worth Rs.10,000 from the Taj Hotels Palaces Resorts Safaris and additional travel vouchers worth more Rs.11,800.

  • Complimentary airport lounge access: You will get 4 complimentary airport lounge visits per year to 11 airport lounges in Mumbai, Bangalore, Delhi and 9 other cities in India. The maximum free visits are capped at one per quarter.
  • Free priority pass membership: Cardholders can avail free membership to the Priority Pass Program worth US$99. Accompanying guests to pay a usage fee of US$32 for every visit.
  • Dining offers: Through the American Express Selects Dining Programme, you can avail up to 20% discount at select premium restaurants, multi-cuisines and others.
  • Pay in EMI: You can convert any big purchase of Rs.5,000 and above in easy monthly instalments (EMI) through American Express Pay-in-parts facility.

The feature offers low-interest rates, paperless approval and zero foreclosure charges.

  • Zero fuel surcharge: Use the Amex Platinum Travel credit card at Hindustan Petroleum fuel stations and avail 0% fuel surcharge on transactions up to Rs.25,000. Fuel purchases above Rs.25,000 are eligible for a discounted fuel surcharge of 0.3%.
  • Add-on credit cards: You are eligible for 2 supplementary credit cards at no extra cost. The cards can be availed for immediate family members including spouse, parents, siblings and children of above 18 years of age.
  • Zero liability on lost card: In case of lost or stolen card, you are 0% liable for any fraudulent transactions that may happen on the card after reporting. Loss before reporting is limited to a maximum of Rs.1,000.
  • Rewards program: Earn 1 membership reward point on every Rs.50 spent on the card except on fuel, insurance, utility payments, and cash withdrawals.

Accrued reward points can be redeemed for travel vouchers or from over 600 redemption options.

elements.body: The American Express Platinum Reserve Credit Card is a delight to those who adore luxury in the multiple aspects of life. From travel to health to dining, it provides premium benefits on multiple categories. It gives you complimentary lounge access, discounts on health care packages, etc.

sections.title: Key Highlights Of The American Express Platinum Reserve Credit Card

elements.body:
The American Express Platinum Reserve Credit Card is a premium lifestyle card that offers benefits across multiple lifestyle categories like travel, hotel, dining, and wellness.

Lifestyle benefits on the American Express Platinum Reserve Credit Card

  • You get multiple movie and online shopping vouchers every year with the Platinum Reserve Credit Card.
  • There are special discounts on dining and premium hotel brands like Preferred Hotels & Resorts and Taj Hotels Palaces Resorts Safaris.
  • Other privileges include golf lessons and concierge services.
  • You enjoy the special privilege of complimentary access to airport lounges.

Offers on BankBazaar

Free Amazon voucher: BankBazaar gives you an Amazon voucher that is worth Rs.1,000 on applying for the card.

Paperless application: The paperless application process offered by the website is a genuine advantage that saves you from undesirable hassles.

sections.title: Features And Benefits Of The American Express Platinum Reserve Credit Card

elements.body:
Welcome gift: 11,000 Bonus Membership Rewards Points once you pay the annual fee and if the cumulative spends within the first 60 days of card issuance reach Rs.5,000.

Dining offers

  • The Taj Epicure Plan offers valuable rewards and benefits at over 150 restaurants, bars, and spas of the Taj Hotels Palaces Resorts Safaris.
  • You also get complimentary membership to the EazyDiner Prime program that gives you a 25% discount at all Prime restaurants along with other privileges.

Complimentary lounge access

  • Enjoy 12 free visits per year to American Express Lounges along with 31 other domestic airport lounges within India.
  • You also receive a complimentary membership to the airport Priority Pass programme worth US$99 per year.

Reward points program

  • Every Rs.50 spent on the card gives you 1 Membership Rewards Point except for spends on fuel, insurance, utility payments, and cash withdrawals.
  • You can enjoy up to 20 Bonus Membership Rewards Points for making purchases at Amex Membership Rewards partner outlets.
  • Accrued points can be used to pay card charges or to redeem gifts and vouchers across various categories including travel, accessories, dining and more. They can also be used to book flight tickets through'Pay with Points' option.

Health and wellness benefits: Avail special discounts on healthcare packages from premium health brands like Max Healthcare, Fortis Healthcare, and Texas Medical Concierge.

Golf privileges: You get complimentary access to 25 premier golf courses in India. You can enjoy zero green fee at all domestic golf courses and golf lessons at discounted rates.

Monthly free gift vouchers: Spend Rs.25,000 and more in a month and get a complimentary BookMyShow or Flipkart voucher worth Rs.500. Access to the free vouchers is upon enrolment.

Supplementary cards: You are entitled to 4 free supplementary cards that carry the same features as the primary card.

Dedicated concierge service: From arranging a golf round to booking a vehicle, Amex provides dedicated Platinum concierge services to you. Through the concierge services, you can get assistance for various bookings like movies, dining reservations, flowers or gifts, golf rounds, etc.

Purchase protection: Everything you purchase with the Platinum Reserve card comes with protection. In case the item is stolen or gets damaged within 60 days of purchase, the entire purchase amount will be refunded to you.

24X7 assistance: Any card related queries or concerns can be resolved through a 24X7 Platinum Assist toll-free service helpline.

Zero liability on lost card: You remain 0% liable on all the transactions that take place on the card once it's lost or stolen. However, the loss needs to be reported within 3 working days of the incidence.

Air accident insurance: You get an air accident insurance cover worth Rs.1 crore free for air tickets bought using the card.

Fuel benefits: With the American Express Platinum Reserve Credit Card, you enjoy 0% convenience fee at HPCL stations across the country.

  • Rs.8,000 Amazon gift card.
  • Rs.7,000 Tanishq voucher.
  • Rs.7,500 credit against your statement.

From the 24 Karat Gold Collection you can get the following with 24,000 points:

  • Bose Sound Link Color II Bluetooth speaker.
  • Rs.11,000 worth online vouchers from American Express domestic travel.
  • Rs.10,000 statement credit.

Alternatively, points can be converted to air miles with selected airline partners and can be redeemed for a flight ticket.

sections.title: Eligibility & Documentation of American Express Gold Card

elements.body:
Eligibility criteria for the Amex Gold Card are:

  • You have to be over 18 years.
  • If you are self-employed, your company should be in business for a minimum of 12 months.
  • You must have a good credit history and should not have defaulted on your payments.
  • You must have a minimum annual income of Rs.6 lakh

The documents required are:

  • A copy of your PAN card.
  • Your office address.
  • Details of your American Express card, if any.
  • Address proof which includes your postcode.
  • Contact details.

sections.title: How to Apply Online American Express Gold Card

elements.body: You can apply for this card on American Express' website. The entire application form will not take longer than 10 minutes to complete if you have all the required information handy.

items.question: Can I transfer my Membership Reward Points to any airline?
items.answer: No, you can only convert Membership Reward Points to air miles of participating carriers. These include Virgin Atlantic, Singapore Airlines, Etihad, Finnair, Qatar, Emirates, British Airways, and Asia Miles partners.

items.question: How many points do I need to redeem them for air miles?
items.answer: Depending on the frequent flyer programme you are converting your points to, the minimum number of points required per conversion can range anywhere from 500 points to 1,600 points.

items.question: Can I redeem my points for products apart from those in the 18 Karat and 24 Karat Gold catalogue?
items.answer: Yes, as long as you are redeeming your points for products which are part of the Amex catalogue. However, do keep in mind that vouchers for particular products may be subject to their own terms and conditions.

items.question: Is there any fee if I default on my payment?
items.answer: Yes, you will be charged a fee which is 5% per month on the outstanding amount subject to a minimum of Rs.300.

items.question: How do I know if my card is enabled for contactless payments?
items.answer: Check your card to see if it has the contactless network symbol. This symbol will be on both sides of the card. If your card has this symbol, then you can use it for contactless transactions. You don't have to do anything else to activate this feature.

sections.title: SBI ELITE Credit Card

elements.body:
The State Bank of India offers the ELITE card for the people who travel frequently all over the country and the world. It is a travel and lifestyle credit card which offers a wide range of offers such as domestic and international lounge access, and discounts on an international and domestic flight and hotel bookings. Apart from this, the ELITE credit card has dining and entertainment offers as well.

Key Highlights of the SBI ELITE Credit Card Welcome Benefits
  • For every Rs.100 spent, earn 2 reward points.
Entertainment Benefits
  • Get free movie tickets worth Rs.6,000 every year.
  • This offer will be valid for a minimum of 2 tickets per booking per month.
Milestone Benefits
  • Earn up to 10,000 reward points on an annual expenditure of Rs.3 lakh and 4 lakhs.

    Add - Earn up to 15,000 reward points on annual spends.

Low Foreign Exchange Markup
  • The SBI ELITE credit card offers the lowest forex mark-up charge at 1.99% for international use.
Concierge Service
  • With this card, you are also entitled to exclusive assistance from the bank with travel bookings, holiday packages, movies and dining reservations.
Annual Fee Waiver
  • The annual fee is waived off if your annual expenditure is more than Rs.10 lakh.

sections.title: Benefits and Features of SBI ELITE Credit Card

elements.body:
Trident Privilege Membership
  • Enjoy a complimentary Trident Privilege Red Tier Membership.
  • On registration, get a welcome gift of 1,000 points.
  • Get 1,500 bonus points on your first stay at the hotel and an additional Rs.1,000 hotel credit on an extended overnight stay.
Fuel Surcharge Waiver
  • 1% fuel surcharge is waived off on transactions ranging from Rs.500 to Rs.4,000 at any petrol pump.
  • The maximum surcharge waived per credit card is Rs.250.
Domestic Airport Lounge Program
  • Benefit from the Domestic Lounge Program offered by the card.
  • Avail 2 complimentary domestic lounge visits every quarter in the country.
International Airport Lounge Program
  • With the credit card, complimentary membership to the Priority Pass Program is given.
  • Enjoy 6 complimentary international lounge visits per year. Maximum of 2 visits per quarter.
  • Get access to more than 1,000 airport lounges all over the world.
Club Vistara Membership
  • Get complimentary membership to Club Vistara Silver.
  • Get 1 free Lounge Access Voucher and 1 Upgrade Voucher.
  • With every Rs.100 spent, get 9 Club Vistara Points.
MasterCard / VISA Privileges
  • Save up to 10% on car rental bookings with Hertz and up to 35% on car rentals with Avis.
  • Earn up to 10,000 points per night on hotel stay on Kaligo.com along with 25% extra miles.
  • Get up to 50% off on gold games and 1 complimentary lesson per month with your credit card. Available at selected golf courses in India.
Fraud Liability Cover
  • Enjoy free Rs.1 lakh fraud liability cover on your card.
  • The cover is applicable from the period of 2 days prior to the reporting of loss till 7 days post reporting of loss.

sections.title: SBI ELITE Credit Card Limit

elements.body: The credit limit of the State Bank of India ELITE credit card is given at the discretion of the bank. There are several factors involved which are the credit history of the applicant, the credit report and score. Apart from this, the ongoing debts or loans of the applicant is a factor for deciding the card limit.

sections.title: Latest Offer Benefits of SBI ELITE Credit Card

elements.body:
Shopping offers
  • Enjoy a cashback of 5% on selected phones from the Vivo online store.
  • On a minimum transaction of Rs.2,500 and above, get 7.5% cashback at all Spencer's stores.
  • Apply the promo code SBI100 to get an Rs.3,000 discount at purchases made on Rentomojo.
  • Avail EMI mode of payment on purchases made on Myntra.com, Bodyshop.in, Amazon.in, Snapdeal.com, Flipkart.com, etc.
  • Get cashback of 5% on the purchase of Canon products at the store for a minimum purchase amount of Rs.35,000.
Dining Offers
  • Enjoy a discount of 20% every Monday and Tuesday on your food orders by applying the coupon code SBI200.
  • At selected restaurants on Nearbuy.com, get a cashback of 5% on a minimum transaction amount of Rs.1,500.
Travel Offers
  • Get a discount of Rs.1,000 on flight bookings made on EaseMyTrip.
  • Enjoy a discount of 20% on domestic and international hotel bookings on EaseMyTrip.
  • Avail a wide range of discounts on domestic and international flights on Travelxp.
  • Benefit from EMI mode of payments available on travel bookings on Cleartrip and Yatra.com.

sections.title: Reward Point Benefits of SBI ELITE credit card

elements.body:
• On dining, departmental store purchases and grocery spends, get 5X reward points.
  • For every Rs.100 spent on other purchases, earn 2 reward points.

sections.title: How To Redeem Reward Points?

elements.body:
Redeeming reward points can be done through net banking. To do so, here are the steps you need to follow:

  • Log in to your net banking account.
  • Select the option of 'redeem rewards' from the main page.
  • Your rewards will be shown on the left side of the page.
  • Choose the reward category from which you wish to redeem the points.
  • Add your city.
  • Input the quantity of the reward and then select 'add to cart'.
  • Check the disclaimer and then select the option of 'place order'.

sections.title: Eligibility of the SBI ELITE Credit Card

elements.body:
• You must be between the ages of 18-70 years.
  • The add-on cardholder must be above the age of 15 years.
  • The applicant must be a citizen of India.
  • A credit score of 750 or above is essential to be eligible for the card.

sections.title: Documents Required To Apply For The SBI Elite Credit Card

elements.body:
• Identity proof, which is PAN, driving license, Aadhaar Card, etc.
  • Proof of income such as the latest salary slips, Form 16, copy of IT returns, etc.
  • Filled application form.
  • A copy of Form 60 or PAN card.
  • Proof of residence which can be a Passport, Ration card, electricity bill, Aadhaar, etc.
  • Colored passport size photographs of the applicant.

The above-mentioned list of documents is indicative. It can be changed, or additional documents can be asked when you apply for the ELITE credit card.

sections.title: How To Apply For The Sbi Elite Credit Card Online?

elements.body:
The primary method to apply for this card is through the website of State Bank of India.

However, you can also apply for a credit card through the website of BankBazaar. To do so, here are the steps which need to be followed:

  • Click on the option of 'Check Eligibility' to check if you are eligible for the card.
  • Add the information which is asked and submit it.
  • The portal will need a list of documents to be uploaded.
  • Once done, you can use the tracking ID under the option of 'Track Application'.

items.question: What is the joining fee I should pay at the time of card issuance?
items.answer: You will be required to pay Rs.4,999 as the initial fee.

items.question: How much is the membership fee per annum? Can I get it waived off?
items.answer: The annual membership fee for SBI ELITE credit card is Rs.4,999. The annual fee is waived off if you spend Rs.10 lakh or more with the card for a year.

items.question: Explain the fraud liability cover that comes with this card.
items.answer: Cardholders are offered a fraud liability cover worth Rs.1 lakh. You will be required to report the loss within 48 hours. You will need to visit the website of the bank or call the SBI credit card customer care helpline.

items.question: What is the cash advance limit for SBI ELITE Card?
items.answer: The cash advance limit offered for this card is up to 80% of the total credit limit.

items.question: Can I apply for a supplementary card?
items.answer: Yes, you can avail various add-on cards on the Elite Credit Card. You can apply for a supplementary card online or by visiting the nearest branch.

elements.prefix: Mrs. Sharma enjoys cashback on all her retail purchases. You could too!

elements.body:
• Benefits worth Rs 12,000/- every year
  • 5X reward points on International, Dining and Grocery spends
  • Welcome gift worth Rs.3000/-
  • Access to over 600 airport lounges through a priority pass

Our country has reached at that economic point where the corporate culture is catching up at a great pace and is almost there. This corporate culture in the banking and financing arena has been nothing short of a miracle that has led to the introduction of credit cards. The terms and conditions of credit cards are well-accepted and competitive schemes that showers the users with rebates and free gifts has only enticed the masses more and more to this credit card culture.

The new enticements are all part of credit card providers' determinations to make credit cards the top go-to swipe choice for clients in light of recent RBI guidelines. Your SBI Platinum Credit Card sees to it that you are handsomely rewarded at every stage of your life.

elements.prefix: Mr. Sharma is enjoying free airport lounge access with his Credit Card. What about you?

sections.title: Benefits of SBI Platinum Credit Card:

elements.body:
• When you sign up for this card, you get a welcome gift- coupon for INR.3000.
  • You will earn reward points for spends in supermarkets, international travel, restaurants etc.
  • You can gain entry to around 200 Golf Courses in the world as a complimentary gift.
  • Gain free access to airport lounge using Priority Pass Program for little or nominal fees.
  • SMS, Email alerts and monthly statements will make sure that you are informed of your card performance and transactions.
  • If you spend more than five lakh rupees per year, you are entitled to get a free domestic air ticket (one-way).
  • Use the card for more than one year and start the next year with an anniversary gift coupon worth INR. 3000.
  • You can easily handle your SBI Card account using netbanking.
  • Alerts to make sure that your utility bills are paid before the due date which will also fetch more reward points.
  • There is also the Easy Money Facility. Request for a bank draft, which will be later debited to your SBI Card account.

sections.title: Features of SBI Platinum Credit Card:

elements.body:
• An SBI Platinum Credit Card holder can earn up to 40,000 redeemable reward points in a year.
  • Apart from premium lounge entry and golf club access, you can track your account anytime anywhere using your phone or online bank account.
  • You can also access e-statements of every transaction done with your card.
  • SBI Platinum Card provides you with a free Easy Bill Pay facility to make sure that you pay all your utility bills before due date. This will also fetch you more cash points.
  • In case of theft or loss, the card will be instantly replaced if you report it to the 24*7 helpline.

sections.title: Eligibility & Documentation:

elements.body:
• You should be an earning individual who should be above age 21 and less than 60.
  • You must submit photocopies of your national ID card, income papers and address proofs.

elements.prefix: Mr. Sharma enjoys great discounts on dining with his Credit Card. What about you?

sections.title: How to apply:

elements.body: Visit BankBazaar.com and browse through the SBI credit cards page. You have the option to either explore or check your eligibility for different cards. BankBazaar will give you a list of carefully chosen credit cards as per your needs. Click on 'Apply'and type down your personal info to apply for the card immediately.

sections.title: SBI Platinum Card Fees and Charges:

elements.body:
• One-time joining fee for the SBI Platinum Card is Rs. 2,999.
  • Cardholders are charged an annual fee of Rs. 2,999 for every membership year.
  • Cardholders also get an interest free credit period of 20 to 50 days which is applicable for retail purchases.
  • The cash advance limit for SBI Platinum Card is 80% of the credit limit.
  • Finance charges are up to 3.35% per month, starting from the date of withdrawal.
  • The cash advance fee is 2.5% of the transaction amount or Rs.300 when the SBI Platinum card is used at domestic ATMs and 3% of the transaction amount at international ATMs.

items.question: What is the fee I should pay at the time of signing up for SBI Platinum credit card?
items.answer: You need to pay INR. 2999 as joining fee.

items.question: What is the annual renewal fee I should pay for my card?
items.answer: It is INR. 2999, which you can be exempted from if you have enough points accumulated.

items.question: Can I apply for a supplementary card?
items.answer: You can apply for additional cards for your family members' use (only if they are above age 18).

items.question: What is Flexi Pay feature?
items.answer: The card comes with a Flexi Pay feature that allows you to make big purchases beyond your current budget. It can be easily repaid via EMIs at quite a low interest scheduled at your convenience.

items.question: Tell me more about the fuel surcharge benefits.
items.answer: Cardholders can avail a 2.5 percent additional fuel surcharge rebate, not exceeding INR.250, for each fill between INR.500 & INR. 4000.

sections.title: Key Highlights of the Air India SBI Signature Card

elements.body:
• Enjoy a welcome gift of 20,000 reward points on paying the joining fee of the card.
  • Avail lost card liability cover of Rs.1 lakh.
  • Make the most of the balance transfer facility on EMI to save money while paying your dues.
  • With the card, you can book railway tickets and have them delivered at your home.
  • Get up to 1,00,000 bonus reward points on an annual basis.
  • With the Priority Pass Program, enjoy access to more than 600 international airport lounges.
  • Enjoy a reward of 5,000 points on paying your renewal fee after a year.

sections.title: Features and Benefits of the Air India Signature Credit Card

elements.body:
Travel Benefits

  • With the Priority Pass Program, enjoy complimentary access at more than 600 Airport Luxury Lounges.
  • Make the most of the free Visa Lounge Access Program for 2 complimentary visits at domestic airport lounges per quarter.

Fuel Benefits:

  • 1% of fuel surcharge will be waived for purchases worth between Rs.500 and Rs.4,000 at all petrol pumps.
  • Enjoy a maximum of waiver of Rs.250 per month with the credit card.

Bill Pay Benefits

  • Pay your electricity, telephone, insurance, and other utility bills with the Easy Bill Pay facility on the credit card.

EMI Benefits

  • Purchases with your credit card worth more than Rs.2,500 can be converted into EMIs within 30 days with Flexipay.

Railway Booking Benefits

  • Book your railway tickets with this credit card and get them delivered to your home.

Reward Point Benefits

  • Up to 30 Reward Points for every Rs.100 spent on Air India tickets.
  • 1 point = 1 Air India air mile.
  • Earn 4 points for every Rs.100 spent.

Emergency Card Replacement

  • State Bank of India also provides the benefit of card replacement anywhere in the world with a 24/7 helpline.

sections.title: Air India SBI Signature Card Limit

elements.body: The limit of this credit card is at the discretion of the State Bank of India. The bank decides the credit limit depending on a number of factors such as the credit score of the applicant, the credit history, and the repayment of past and ongoing debts.

sections.title: Latest offer Benefits of the Air India SBI Signature Card

elements.body:
Travel and Hotel Offers

  • Get cashback of up to Rs.600 on domestic flights bookings on ixigo.com.
  • Enjoy a cashback offer of Rs.2,400 on international flight bookings on a minimum purchase amount of Rs.18,000 on ixigo.com.
  • Avail a wide range of discounts on domestic and international flight bookings on MakeMyTrip.
  • Make the most of your card by availing discounts on hotel bookings on MakeMyTrip.
  • Enjoy a discount of Rs.1,000 on flight bookings on EaseMyTrip.
  • Get a flat discount of 20% on your domestic and international hotel bookings on EaseMyTrip.
  • With your credit card, get Rs.100 off on bus bookings.
  • Book your travels on Travelxp with your credit card and get a wide range of offers.
  • Avail EMI payment for your travel bookings on Cleartrip and choose from a range of tenure options.
  • Make the most of your travel bookings by opting EMI payments on Goibibo, goindigo.in, and Emirates.
  • Book your travel through Yatra.com and choose from a wide range of tenure options for EMI payment.

Shopping Offers

  • Enjoy a discount of Rs.200 on your weekend purchases at Grofers with your credit card.
  • Avail a cashback offer of 7.5% on purchases made at LG stores.
  • Get a cashback of 5% on mobile phone purchases at Vivo merchant outlets or online stores.
  • With purchases made on RentoMojo, get a discount of up to Rs.3,000.
  • Benefit from EMI mode of payments on a wide range of products on Myntra.com.
  • Visit Shoppers Stop and HomeTown Stores and pay for your purchases with EMI.

Dining Offers

  • Enjoy discounts up to 20% on Zomato every Monday and Tuesday.
  • Get up to a 15% discount on more than 1,000 restaurants under the 'Happy Dining Program'.

sections.title: Reward Point Benefits of the Air India SBI Signature credit card

elements.body:
• Make the most of the complimentary membership of Air India's Frequent flyer program.
  • Get 4 reward points for every spend of Rs.100.
  • Avail up to 30 reward points for every Rs.100 spent for Air India tickets from the mobile app or website of Air India.
  • You get 10 points on booking Air India flight tickets for others.

sections.title: How to redeem reward points?

elements.body:
You can redeem your reward points through net banking, phone banking as well as by contacting the customer care.

Here are the steps which you need to follow to redeem your points through net banking:

  • Log in to your SBI net banking account.
  • Click on the option of 'redeem rewards.'
  • You will then see your total reward points shown on the left side of the page.
  • Choose your reward category.
  • Add the city where you currently live.
  • Add the quantity of your reward and then click on 'add to cart'.
  • Agree to the terms and conditions and then click the option on 'place order'.

sections.title: Eligibility for Air India SBI Signature Card

elements.body:
• You must be an Indian citizen.
  • The age of the primary credit cardholder must be above 18 years of age.
  • The applicant must have a high credit score.

sections.title: Documents required for the Air India SBI Signature Card

elements.body:
• Proof of income which will be the latest salary slips, IT returns and a copy of Form 16.
  • Age proof which can be Aadhaar card, Passport, etc.
  • Identity proof which can include PAN card, Driving License, Aadhaar card, etc.
  • Duly filled application form.
  • A copy of Form 60.
  • Address proof such as Aadhaar card, Passport, etc.
  • Coloured passport-size photographs.

sections.title: How to apply for Air India SBI Signature Card Online?

elements.body:
You can apply for this credit card primarily from the website of the State of Bank of India. However, you can also apply through the BankBazaar website.

Here are the steps to apply for this card through BankBazaar:

  • Select the option of 'Check Eligibility' in order to check if you are eligible for the credit card.
  • Fill the information which is asked from the portal.
  • A list of documents will need to be uploaded according to what is asked.
  • Once done, click on submit.

You can use the tracking ID under the option of 'Track Application' on the webpage.

items.question: Is the Air India SBI Signature Card safe to use?
items.answer: Yes, being a chip and pin enabled card, it is a safe credit card that you can use without worrying about security. This feature of the card protects it from counterfeiting and skimming.

items.question: What are the railway tickets surcharge on the Air India SBI Signature Card?
items.answer: For railway tickets through counters, the surcharge is Rs. 30 + 2.5% of the transaction amount. For railway tickets through the Indian Railways website, it's 1.8% of the transaction amount + service charge.

items.question: Do I need to pay anything for my Priority Pass member lounge visits with my Air India SBI Signature Card?
items.answer: Yes, whenever you visit any Priority Pass member lounge, a usage fee would be charged on your Air India SBI Signature Card. This charge can be up to $27.

items.question: What is the interest-free credit period that I receive on my Air India SBI Signature Card?
items.answer: You can enjoy an interest-free credit period of 20 to 50 days on your Air India SBI Signature Card. However, the interest-free period is applicable to retail spends on your credit card only. Moreover, to avail the interest-free period, you need to pay the full amount of the previous month's outstanding balance.

items.question: What options do I have for paying the dues on my Air India SBI Signature Card?
items.answer: You get multiple online and offline options for paying the dues on your Air India SBI Signature Card. The online methods include NEFT, Auto Debit facility, Internet Banking, Mobile Banking, Visa Credit Card Pay, National Automated Clearing House, etc.

sections.title: Key Highlights of the Air India SBI Platinum Card

elements.body:
• As its name suggests, the Air India SBI Platinum Card has been designed to deliver premium benefits to frequent air travellers.
  • Travel bookings made on Air India are eligible for accelerated reward points.

sections.title: Travel benefits offered by the Air India SBI Platinum Card

elements.body:
• The card offers you a complimentary membership to the premium Air India Frequent Flyer Program - Flying Returns.
  • For every Rs.100 that you spend on booking air tickets on the Air India website, you earn up to 15 reward points.
  • It also offers complimentary access to lounges at domestic airports.

sections.title: Offers from BankBazaar on the Air India SBI Platinum Card

elements.body:
• You would love the paperless application process for the Air India SBI Platinum Card offered by BankBazaar.
  • You may check your credit score without paying anything for it on BankBazaar.

sections.title: Air India SBI Platinum Card Features and Benefits

elements.body:
Welcome rewards

  • You can bag a welcome gift of 5,000 SBI reward points while signing up for the card. The reward points will be credited within 15 days of joining/annual fee payment.
  • You also get free membership to the Air India Frequent Flyer Program - Flying Returns as a joining benefit.

Milestone Reward points

  • You can earn up to 15,000 bonus points on achieving milestone annual spends.
  • For annual spends of Rs.2 lakh, you earn 5,000 reward points and for spends above Rs.3 lakh, you earn 10,000 reward points. Thus, the cumulative bonus reward points earned is 15,000.

Renewal benefit: You earn 2,000 reward points every year when you pay the renewal fee for the card.

Reward points program

  • You earn 2 reward points on every Rs.100 spent on the card.
  • Every Rs.100 spent on Air India ticket booking (for self) will give you 15 reward points and 5 reward points (for others).
  • Reward points can be converted into Air India Air Miles which can be further redeemed for travel bookings made on Air India. 1 Reward point equals 1 Air India Air Mile.

Fuel surcharge waiver

  • You can avail 1% fuel surcharge waiver on all fuel transactions conducted using the card. The waiver is valid at all petrol pumps across India for transactions worth Rs.500 to Rs.4,000.
  • The maximum waiver that can be availed per billing cycle is Rs.250.

Complimentary lounge access:With the Visa Lounge Access Program, you enjoy 8 complimentary visits to select domestic airport lounges. You can also enjoy access to lounges at over 600 international airports with the complimentary Priority Pass Program

Balance transfer on EMI:You can transfer the outstanding balance on your other bank credit cards to the SBI card and pay it back in EMIs. The balance transfer on EMI offered by SBI comes at a lesser interest rate and processing fee.

Flexipay: The facility enables you to convert any big-ticket purchases made on the card into easy monthly instalments. Any purchase worth Rs.2,500 or above can be converted into EMIs and can be paid back in tenures ranging from 3 to 12 months.

Lost Card Liability Cover: You also enjoy a lost card liability coverage of Rs.1 lakh with the Air India SBI Platinum Card.

Railway tickets bookings: With the Air India SBI Platinum Card, you get the facility of booking railway tickets online and getting them delivered at your doorstep.

Eligibility to apply for the Air India SBI Platinum Card

To be eligible for the Air India SBI Platinum Card,

  • You need to maintain a stable income source. You would be informed about the income criteria when you apply for the card.
  • You must meet the age criteria as specified by SBI.
  • You should maintain a high credit score.

*If there are any other eligibility criteria, you would be informed about the same.

sections.title: Documents needed to apply for the Air India SBI Platinum Card

elements.body:
• The required documents include your PAN Card photocopy, income proofs, and one photograph.
  • You also need to submit your address proof and ID proof.

*If there are any other eligibility criteria, you would be informed about the same.

sections.title: How to apply for the Air India SBI Platinum Card online?

elements.body:
You can apply for the Air India SBI Platinum Card online on the SBI credit card website.

Also, another option to apply for the Air India SBI Platinum Card is through BankBazaar website. This can be done through the following steps.

  • On the Air India SBI Platinum Card page on BankBazaar.com, select 'Check Eligibility' and complete the formalities.
  • Next, you have to enter the required details followed by uploading of the documents. Click 'Submit' when it is done.
  • To check the status of the Air India SBI Platinum Card, click on 'Track Your Application' and enter the application ID shared with you.

faq.title: FAQs on the Air India SBI Platinum Card

items.question: When I apply for Air India SBI Platinum Card, can I save my half-done application and continue later?
items.answer: Yes, you may. The SBI web page has that feature.

items.question: How can I retrieve my Air India SBI Platinum Card saved application?
items.answer: To retrieve your Air India SBI Platinum Card saved application, you can simply log in to the application page and click the retrieve option.

items.question: How do I use my Air India SBI Platinum Card for air miles?
items.answer:
For converting the reward points on the Air India SBI Platinum Card to Air India Air Miles, call SBI Card helpline at 1860 180 1290 or 39020202. You require a minimum of 5,000 reward points for availing the redemption option.

Air Mile redemption has to be in multiples of 5,000 and will be converted within 7 working days from the date of receiving the request.

sections.title: Key Highlights of Axis Bank My Zone Credit Card

elements.body:
• The Axis Bank My Zone Credit Card meets the needs of people who seek lifestyle benefits on their credit card.
  • You get accelerated reward points when you use the card for weekend dining and shopping.
  • The first year fee of Rs.500 is waived off on spends of Rs.5,000 within 45 days of the card issuance.

sections.title: Lifestyle benefits with the Axis Bank My Zone Credit Card

elements.body: The Axis Bank My Zone Credit Card provides special cashback offers, discounts, and rewards on categories like shopping, dining, online transactions and a lot more.

sections.title: Axis Bank My Zone Credit Card Features and Benefits

elements.body:
Welcome benefit: A bulk 100 points will be credited when the card is used for online shopping for the first time.

Rewards point programme

  • For every Rs.200 spent on the card, you get 4 to 40 reward points.
  • You also get 10 times more reward points on weekend spends on dining at select hotels and restaurants.
  • You get 5 times more reward points on weekend shopping at partner stores.
  • The earned reward points can be redeemed for 500+ rewards and offers listed in Axis eDGE Loyalty Rewards Catalogue.

Free lounge visits: Axis My Zone Credit Card users can enjoy 4 complimentary visits per year to participating airport lounges within India.

Cashback on movie bookings: Movie ticket booking made using the My Zone Credit Card will make you eligible for a 25% discount on the total booking account. The offer is valid throughout the week for both online and box office bookings made using the card.

A secure card: The Axis Bank My Zone Credit Card is an EMV certified chip card that is protected by chip as well as a PIN. The inbuilt chip enables more secure transactions than a magnetic strip card. It reduces the risks of counterfeit and skimming fraud.

Fuel surcharge waiver: Get 1% fuel surcharge waiver for fuel transactions carried out at all fuel stations across India. The waiver is valid on card transactions between Rs.400 and Rs.4,000. The maximum surcharge waiver is capped at Rs.400 per billing cycle.

Dining privileges: Under Axis Banks 'Dining Delights' programme, you enjoy a minimum 15% off on dining bills at select restaurants in the country.

Convert purchases to EMI: Any purchase above Rs.2,500 made using the card can be converted into easy monthly instalments by contacting the bank. You can repay the amount in tenures of 6, 9, 12, 18, or 24 months.

How long will the bank take to approve my Axis Bank My Zone Credit Card application?

You would know about the decision on your application for the Axis Bank My Zone Credit Card within 21 working days from the date the bank receives your request.

What is the maximum cashback amount for movies that the Axis Bank My Zone Credit Card offers?

Will I earn reward points on fuel transactions with my Axis Bank My Zone Credit Card?

sections.title: IndianOil Citi Platinum Credit Card

elements.body:
If most of your day is spent commuting and getting from one place to the other, consider getting the IndianOil Citi Platinum Credit Card. With this, you can easily save on your fuel costs and moreover, using this card is one way by which you can earn free fuel.

Key Highlights of IndianOil Citi Platinum Card
  • Get up to 71 litres of fuel free every year.
  • Earn up to 4 Turbo Points on all spends.
  • Redeem Turbo Points for free fuel or gift vouchers from various brands.
  • Enjoy a waiver on the annual fee (Rs.1,000), when you spend a minimum of Rs.30,000 p.a.

sections.title: Benefits & Features of IndianOil Citi Platinum Card

elements.body:
• Get 4 Turbo Points for every Rs.150 spent on fuel at authorised IndianOil outlets across India. This adds up to savings of 2.67% on the fuel purchased.
  • 4 Turbo Points per Rs.150 spent is capped at Rs.10,000 per transaction or 267 Turbo Points. Transactions higher than Rs.10,000 will not earn any Turbo Points.
  • Enjoy complete waiver on fuel surcharge.
  • 1 Turbo Point is worth Rs.1 of fuel.
  • Get 2 Turbo Points per Rs.150 spent at supermarkets and on groceries.
  • Turbo Points earned on daily spends is capped at Rs.5,000 per month. This means that you can earn a maximum of 67 points per month on your daily spends.
  • Get 1 Turbo Point per Rs.150 on all other spends.
  • Turbo Pints do not expire, so you can redeem them whenever you please.
  • Enjoy contactless payment facilities at terminals which accept contactless cards.
  • No need to enter your PIN for transactions up to Rs.2,000 in India.
  • Enjoy access to Citi's concierge service by calling 1800 114 999.
  • With Citi's dining privileges, you can save up to 15% at selected restaurants.

sections.title: IndianOil Citi Platinum Credit Card Limit

elements.body:
The credit limit (the amount beyond which you cannot use your card for any type of transaction without incurring a fine) will be notified to you by the bank at the time of issuance of the card. This limit can be changed from time to time.
In cases where your income has increased, you can always request the bank for a credit limit increase. The increase in your credit limit is at the bank's discretion.

sections.title: Latest Offer Benefits

elements.body:
Your credit card is the key to a door of travel, dining, retail, and lifestyle offers. Here are a few of them:

Offer 1:Get up to 15% Cashback on Duty-free Shopping

Ongoing Offer

What You Get

Up to 15% cashback when you shop at duty-free stores in Chennai, Mumbai, and Kolkata international airport. The 15% cashback is valid on pre-orders made and a minimum transaction value of Rs.4,000. This cashback is also applicable on purchases made at luxury and fashion stores. All other duty-free shopping gets you cashback of 10%.

Offer 2: 25% Cashback on Swiggy

Expiring on 28 June 2019

What You Get

Get flat 25% cashback up to Rs.200 on your Swiggy order. This offer is applicable only on orders placed on Fridays. To enjoy the cashback, use the code 'CITIFOODIES' at checkout.

Offer 3: Up to 25% Cashback on International Flights

Expiring on 29 June 2019

What You Get

Get 25% cashback on international flight bookings made on MakeMyTrip. The minimum booking amount is Rs.15,000 and the maximum cashback is Rs.10,000.

Offer 4: Get 2 Movie Tickets at the Price of 1 on Paytm

Expiring on 28 June 2019

What You Get

Book your movie tickets on the Paytm website or app and use the code 'CITIFRIDAY' to get 2 tickets at the price of one.

Offer 5: Enjoy EMI Offers

Ongoing Offer

What You Get

Buy now and pay later in comfortable monthly instalments with easy EMI offers when you make a purchase with your Citi credit card on sites such as Flipkart and MakeMyTrip among others.Like with all offers, make sure you read the terms and conditions before swiping your card.

sections.title: Rewards Points Benefits of IndianOil Citi Platinum Card

elements.body:
As mentioned earlier, you can earn up to 4 Turbo Points per Rs.150 that you spend on fuel at selected IndianOil outlets. You also get 2 Turbo Points for every Rs.150 that you spend on groceries and at department stores.
Moreover, since your Turbo Points do not expire, you can accumulate them and redeem them for free fuel or lifestyle, dining, shopping, and travel vouchers. Alternatively, you can even convert your points to air miles if you are a member of either Air India or Jet Airways' frequent flyer programme.
If you wish to, you can also adjust your points against the outstanding amount on your card. The transactional value of each Turbo Point, in this case, will be Rs.0.35.

How to Redeem Your Reward Points

There are four ways to redeem the points you earn on your IndianOil Citi Platinum Credit Card.The first is an instant redemption. This can be done at any participating fuel outlets in India. This redemption needs to be done over the counter at the time of payment. You can also redeem your points instantly on Vodafone, Indigo, MakeMyTrip, and Yatra among other partners.

The second way to redeem your points is to log on to Citibank's web page for redemption and choose a product or service from their rewards catalogue. Once you select the product you wish to purchase, put in your card details. Once it has been validated, an alert will be sent to your phone regarding the dispatch of the selected item within four business days.The next way is to convert your points to air miles. Each Turbo Point you transfer will give you 0.75 air miles.
If you would rather get cashback, you can redeem your points for cashback as well. Each point gives you Rs.0.35 as cashback.

elements.body:
ParticularsFee
Joining feeWill be communicated to you at the time of application
Annual feeRs.1,000 (waived on annual expenditure of Rs.30,000)
Interest rate3.25% per month (39% p.a.)

sections.title: Eligibility & Documentation of IndianOil Citi Platinum Card

elements.body:
To apply for this card, you need to be an Indian citizen and at least 18 years old. The documents required are:

  • One passport size photograph (colour)
  • Your signature on a consent form
  • Any one of the following as address proof and photo ID proof:
    • Valid Indian Passport
    • Voter's ID Card
    • NREGA issued job card which is signed by a State Government officer
    • Driving license
    • Aadhaar card or E-aadhaar

sections.title: How to Apply for This Card Online

elements.body:
Apply for this card on BankBazaar by following these steps:

  • Check your eligibility by selecting the 'Check Eligibility' button.
  • Once you have completed this step, you can click the 'Apply' button and follow the steps to complete your application.
  • Hit 'Submit' once you are done.

items.question: What is the minimum number of points that I require for fuel redemption?
items.answer: You will need a minimum of 250 Turbo Points for fuel redemption.

items.question: For instant redemption with travel partners, what is the value of 1 Turbo Point?
items.answer: If you plan to redeem your points instantly with travel partners such as MakeMyTrip and Goibibo, keep in mind that the value of 1 Turbo Point will be Rs.0.25.

items.question: Is there any cap to the 1 Turbo Point that I earn on all other retail purchases?
items.answer: No, there is no cap applicable on earning 1 Turbo Point per Rs.150 spent on retail purchases that do not earn 4 or 2 Turbo Points.

items.question: Is it mandatory to submit my Aadhaar Card to Citibank at the time of application?
items.answer: No, submitting your Aadhaar is not mandatory. It is one of the photo ID documents you can provide to the bank.

items.question: If I redeem my point for cashback, how long will it take for it to reflect in my account?
items.answer: It will take a minimum of 3 business days from the day you place your request for the cashback to be credited to your account.

sections.title: Citi Rewards Card

elements.body: If you love shopping or traveling, Citi Rewards Credit Card is among the top rewards card to get. This card offers several reward options and schemes which will help you to spend less and earn more through points during shopping or traveling.

sections.title: Key Highlights of Citi Rewards Credit Card:

elements.body:
• This card is ideal for people who wish to earn rewards on their travels or any shopping transaction.
  • You can earn up to 10X reward points on credit card purchases at departmental or any apparel store.

sections.title: Features and Benefits of Citi Rewards Credit Card:

elements.body:
Annual Fee Waiver
  • The annual fee of Rs.1,000 is waived off if Rs.30,000 is spent in a year of membership.
  • For the 2nd and subsequent years, on a total expenditure of Rs.30,000 in a year, the annual fee of Rs.1,000 is waived.
Welcome Rewards
  • On your first expenditure made within 30 days of the date of issue, 1500 points will be rewarded to you.
  • For your first spend of Rs.1,000 done within 60 days from the date of issue, 1000 points will be added to the card.
Fuel Benefits
  • The points earned in the Citi Rewards Card can be instantly redeemed in any of the 1200 IndianOil petrol pumps in the country.
  • One reward point equals to INR 0.25 and the minimum points required to redeem it is 250.
In-store and online shopping benefits
  • This credit card enables you to redeem the points for any kind of online purchase or transaction such as movie tickets, travel tickets or even any kind of mobile service.
  • The list for the partner websites of Citibank is available on the bank's website.
Travel miles benefits
  • You as a cardholder can also redeem your frequent flier membership miles in Air India and Jet Airways. 1 reward point will be equal to 0.75 miles and the minimum points to redeem these points will be 100.
  • It is advisable to consult the bank before doing so for better clarity on the terms and policies.
Cashback benefits
  • People who own a Citi Rewards credit card will be able to adjust their points to the outstanding statement of the card. 1 point in the credit card will equal to INR 0.35.
  • Minimum points to redeem will be 5000. It is strongly advised to get in contact with the customer care to understand the cashback benefits of the credit card in detail.
Concierge services

Avail the services of a personal concierge to take care of your party and dining arrangements, travel assistance, etc.

sections.title: Credit Limit on Your Citi Rewards Card

elements.body: The limit on your Citi Rewards Card is the maximum credit amount that you can avail with the card. The limit would be decided by Citibank after evaluating your income, your repayment capacity, and a few other factors. You would know the credit limit once you get the card.

sections.title: Latest Offers on Citi Rewards Credit Card

elements.body:
Zomato discount: Enjoy cashback of 25% (up to Rs.250) on your orders on Zomato. Use the coupon code CITICRIC to avail the offer every Saturday and Sunday till 12 May 2019.

Cashback on Amazon Echo Show: Get Rs.2,000 cashback on purchasing Amazon Echo Show by 30 April 2019.

Bigbasket offer: Get 20% cashback on your purchases on Bigbasket. The validity of the offer is May 1 - May 5 and June 1 - June 5 and the promo code is CITIBB.

Offer on Jet Airways: Enjoy 10% cashback on duty-free transactions on Jet in-flight. The minimum transaction is Rs.4,000, the maximum cashback that can be availed per transaction is Rs1500 and the offer is valid till May 10, 2019.

Movie tickets offer: Book movie tickets on Paytm and get 2 tickets at the price of 1. This is offer is valid every Friday till 28 June 2019. To avail the offer, enter the promo code CITIFRIDAY.

sections.title: Reward benefits of Citi Rewards Credit Card

elements.body:
• For every purchase of Rs.125, you earn 1 reward point.
  • If you spend Rs.30,000 or more in a month, you will earn 300 points.
  • You will earn 1,500 bonus points on the first purchase you make on the card within 30 days of card issuance.
  • 1,000 bonus points will be added to the card when you make the first purchase of Rs.1,000 within 60 days of card issuance.
  • For every transaction at apparel or departmental stores, you get 10X rewards points.

sections.title: Citi Rewards Credit Card Reward Points Redemption

elements.body:
• You can redeem the accrued points at IndianOil outlets. For every reward point, you get Rs.0.25. The minimum points to be redeemed is 250.
  • You can also redeem the points for shopping at partner stores. For every reward point, you get Rs.0.30. The minimum points to be redeemed is 250.
  • If you want to redeem the points for online shopping, you get Rs.0.30 for every reward point. Here too, the minimum number of points should be Rs.250.
  • For redemption at online travel sites, you get Rs.0.25 for every reward point.
  • The redemption offer for air miles stands at 1 Reward Point = 0.75 miles. The minimum number of points required to redeem is 100.
  • To redeem for cashback, the redemption rate is 1 Reward Point = Rs.0.35. The minimum points necessary for redemption is 5,000.
  • You can also redeem the points instantly for gift vouchers from premium brands.
  • The redemption can be carried out in three steps - browsing the catalogue, choosing the desired option, and placing the order using your points.

sections.title: How to apply for the Citi Rewards Card online?

elements.body:
You can apply for the Citi Rewards Card directly from the Citibank website.

Or, you can also apply for the credit card on BankBazaar, from the same page you're currently on, to enjoy the exclusive partner offers and additional benefits.

Follow the steps to apply now -
