Once the documents are submitted successfully, you will receive an acknowledgement message carrying the application ID. You can use the same to track your application on BankBazaar in the later stage.

faq.title: FAQs for the Citi Rewards Card

items.question: What all can I redeem by using Citi rewards credit card?
items.answer: Customers will be able to redeem their Citi rewards credit card points at all Indian Oil outlets for fuel, retail and online stores, for Air Miles with Jet Airways and Air India, cashback, as well as, gift vouchers.

items.question: Am I entitled to dining privileges while using this card?
items.answer: Yes, all customers are entitled to dining privileges including a 15% discount at 2,000 partner restaurants with Citibank credit cards. You can check the list of partner restaurants in the Citibank website or you can contact the Citibank credit card customer care to know more.

items.question: What are the concierge services provided?
items.answer: The personal concierge service of the credit card offers help with sending flowers, planning of parties, making various kinds of reservations, travel assistance, etc.

items.question: How do I contact Citibank for any query regarding my credit card?
items.answer: To contact Citibank credit card customer care number, dial 1860 210 2484.

items.question: Am I eligible to get bonus reward points upon acquiring a Citi Rewards Credit Card?
items.answer: Yes, you get 1,500 bonus points on the first-spend made within 30 days of card issue and 1,000 bonus points on your first Rs.1,000 spend made within 60 days of card issuance.

sections.title: Key Highlights

elements.body:
• Earn PremierMiles on every spend
  • Rs.3,000 annual fee
  • Earn 10 miles for every Rs.100 you spend
  • Redeem miles for flight tickets across 100+ airlines on the PremierMiles website and with select partners

sections.title: Category Specific benefits

elements.body:
• Bonus Air Miles: Cardholders are awarded 10,000 Miles when they make the first spend of Rs.1000 or more on their card within first 60 days of card issuance. Every card renewal will provide 3000 Miles.
  • Accelerated Air Miles: Earn 10 Miles per Rs.100 spent on the card for booking flights and hotels at PremierMiles website. The same number of Miles can be earned on all airline transactions with any airline. On all other transactions, cardholders will earn 4 Air Mile points per Rs.100 spent. Members of a Frequent Flyer Program (FFP) of any airline get 10 Miles per Rs.100 spent on any airline using the PremierMiles card plus regular FFP Miles for flying that airline.
  • Transfer Miles to Airline partners: For every 2 Miles earned on the card, you can get 1 Frequent Flyer Air Mile, which can be transferred on British Airways, Cathay Pacific, Thai Airways, Eva Air, Malaysia Airlines, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways, Singapore Airlines, Turkish Airlines and Air India. Miles can also be transferred to hotel partners.

sections.title: Features of Citi PremierMiles Credit Card:

elements.body:
This card comes with countless features, ideal for the frequent flyer. Read on to find out more about the unique features that come with the PremierMiles card.

  • Track rewards easily: Air Miles can be easily tracked using SMS and through the Citibank web portal. Send SMS REWARDS 'XXXX' to 52484 or 9880752484 to know your reward points balance anytime. (XXXX indicates last 4 digits of your credit card number).
  • Complimentary insurance: Cardholders have air accident insurance cover of up to Rs.1 crore and lost card liability cover of Rs.2 lakh.
  • Instant reward redemption: The accrued reward points can be instantly redeemed by making purchases at select travel partners including goibibo.com, IndiGo, makemytrip.com, and yatra.com. The value of every 100 miles is Rs.45 on travel portals.

Points can also be redeemed on online partner websites like yatra.com, goibibo.com, and goindigo.in where 100 points can be exchanged for Rs.45.

elements.body:
• You must be at least 21 years of age.
  • You must be within 65 years of age.
  • The income criteria differ from time to time and will be communicated when you apply for the card.
  • You should be a resident of India or a Non-resident of India.

sections.title: Documents required to apply for Citi PremierMiles card

elements.body:
Address proofAny one of the documents
  • Passport
  • Telephone bill
  • Electricity bill
  • Passport
  • Voter ID card
  • Ration card
  • Aadhaar card

Note: The above list is for reference only. Citibank reserves the rights to ask you for additional documents if required. However, these are the general documents you will have to keep ready before you start filling the credit card application form.

sections.title: How to apply for Citi PremierMiles card online?

elements.body:
You can apply for a Citi PremierMiles card by visiting the bank's official website. However, if you wish to apply through BankBazaar, the process is as follows:

  • Visit the official BankBazaar website
  • Select "Credit Card” under the "Cards” tab
  • You will be allowed to filter your results
  • Please select cards offered by Citibank
  • Choose "Citi PremierMiles card”
  • Click on the "Check Eligibility” option against the card
  • Enter basic information about yourself
  • You will be redirected to the online application page if you are eligible to apply for the card
  • Enter all the details asked in the online application form
  • Upload the required documents
  • Click on "Submit”
  • You will get an "Application ID” which you can use to track the status of the application

items.question: What documents do I require to apply for PremierMiles credit card?
items.answer: You will need one colour photograph, address proof, ID proof and sign a consent form to apply for this card.

items.question: How do I apply for PremierMiles credit card?
items.answer: You can apply online through the Citibank website or visit any of the nearest Citibank branches to apply for Citibank cards.

items.question: How do I redeem the Miles accumulated on my card?
items.answer: You can easily redeem the Miles using the online portal or through customer hotline. You can also directly use the Miles at Citibank preferred merchant partner outlets across the world.

items.question: What is the validity period for Miles?
items.answer: Air Miles never expire. You can redeem your Miles for flights or other merchandise without any blackout date.

items.question: Do I have EMI option for the purchases that I make with the card?
items.answer: Yes. Citibank offers easy repayment schemes with low interest rate and flexible tenures for purchases made at more than 2000 consumer electronics stores and leading retail merchant outlets.

sections.title: Key highlights of the Citi Cashback Card

elements.body:
• This credit card is mainly for the people who wish to earn cashback rewards on every transaction they make with the card.
  • You as a cardholder will be entitled to get 5% of cashback on every movie ticket purchase.
  • The total cashback earned will be credited to your account automatically once it reaches Rs.500 and further on multiples of Rs.500.
  • This is one of the few credit cards which is contactless, which means it does not require a pin during the swiping of the card. All a customer must do is tap the card and the payment will be made. However, this feature will only be applicable for all the purchases below Rs.2,000.

sections.title: Cashback benefits of the Citi Cashback Card:

elements.body:
• 5% cashback will be rewarded to you on purchases of movie tickets, bill payments or on any payments done for utilities done through Citi Billpay. The maximum cashback you will earn is Rs.100 for each category.
  • On any other category of expenses or spends, 0.5% cashback will be given to you without a limit on the amount for cashback.
  • Any payments for telephone bills will earn a cashback of 5%.
  • The cashback which can be redeemed is in multiples of Rs.500 and will appear automatically in the final credit card statement.
  • You will also be entitled to discounts in the restaurants partnered with Citibank.

sections.title: Features and Benefits of the Citi Cashback credit card:

elements.body:
Cashback Benefits:

  • 5% cashback will be given on booking of movie tickets or any kind of utility payments through Citi Billpay.
  • For the payment of telephone bills, if you are paying with a Citi Cashback card, you will receive a cashback of 5% and the maximum cashback will be Rs.100 per month.
  • Any kind of utility bill payment will result in a cashback of 5% which will also have a cap of Rs.100 per month.
  • On any other type of purchases, you will be entitled to a cashback of 0.5%.
  • On a minimum accumulation of Rs.500, the cashback will be automatically credited to the account and will show on the credit statement.

Shopping benefits:

  • If you own a Citi Cashback card, you will be entitled to receive various discounts and offers in various stores which are partnered with the bank.

Dining benefits:

  • People holding a Citi Cashback card will receive a discount of 15% on close to 2000 restaurants Citibank has partnered with.

EMI benefits:

  • Customers who own the Citi Cashback Card will also receive privileges on EMIs for various products at various electronic stores, shopping outlets, retailing chains as well as during online shopping.

sections.title: Eligibility criteria required to apply for a Citi Cashback credit card:

elements.body:
A person should meet the required eligibility criteria to get a Citi Cashback credit card, which are:

  • The applicant must be above 18 years of age and be an Indian citizen.
  • Along with that, the applicant should also have a good credit report with good payment history and a good score. Apart from this, the applicant must also have a stable income and salary.

sections.title: Documents required for a Citi Cashback credit card:

elements.body:
• Passport size photograph of the applicant.
  • Address proof which will include a copy of the Passport, Ration Card, electricity bill, Aadhaar, etc.
  • Application form of the credit card which must be filled.
  • Form 60 and the PAN card of the applicant.
  • Proof of income such as the latest salary slips, documents of IT returns as well as Form 16 should be provided by the applicant.
  • Identity proof - PAN card, driving license, Aadhaar Card, etc.

sections.title: How to apply for the Citi Cashback Card online?

elements.body:
You can apply for the Citi Cashback Card directly from the Citibank website.

Or, you can also apply for the credit card on BankBazaar, from the same page you're currently on, to enjoy the exclusive partner offers and additional benefits.

Follow the steps to apply now –

  • Navigate to the top of the page to find 'Check Eligibility' button.
  • Click on it, fill the required details to know your eligibility for the card.
  • If you're eligible, you will find an option to apply for the card.
  • Click on it, submit the required details and documents and press 'Submit'

Once the documents are submitted successfully, you will receive an acknowledgement message carrying the application ID. You can use the same to track your capplication status in the later stage.

faq.title: FAQs on Citi Cashback Credit Card:

items.question: What are the different bill payment methods offered to a Citibank customer?
items.answer: The customers can choose to pay their credit card bills via various options such as online banking, Citibank E-Pay, NEFT / RTGS, ATM deposits and ECS debits.

items.question: Are online statements available for a Citi Cashback credit card?
items.answer: Yes, customers can get instant online statements of their credit card from the web portal of Citibank by entering their details.

items.question: What kind of information can I get from Citi Alerts?
items.answer: Citi Alerts help you track your account activity with free SMS and email alerts.

items.question: Can I convert my outstanding credit card balance into EMIs?
items.answer: Yes, customers do have the option of converting the outstanding balance on the credit card into EMIs. This will allow them to pay smaller amounts at one time, also with a lower rate of interest. To know more visit the website of Citibank or you can also call the customer care helpline of the bank.

items.question: What are the documents required to be submitted while applying for a Citibank Cashback credit card?
items.answer:
• One passport size colour photograph
  • Photo ID proof
  • Customer consent form
  • Address proof

sections.title: IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card

elements.body: IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card offers countless travel and lifestyle benefits, a comprehensive rewards programme, and other exciting features that make it suitable for people with all kinds of lifestyle requirements. Try it to enhance your experience of using credit cards.

sections.title: IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card Key Highlights

elements.body:
• Premium lifestyle privileges like gold lessons, concierge services, etc.
  • The best of travel privileges and fuel benefits.

sections.title: Features and Benefits of the IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card

elements.body:
Golf privileges: As a privileged card member you can avail complimentary golf games and lessons exclusively conducted at leading golf clubs in Bengaluru, Ahmedabad, Chennai, Hyderabad, Delhi, Pune and Mumbai.

Travel benefits: Get complimentary membership to Priority Pass Program and enjoy access to over 600 airport lounges across the globe. The Travel Plus program provides special waivers on lounge usage charges outside India. You can avail the usage fee waiver up to 8 times in a year.

Complimentary concierge services: Through the 24x7 concierge services, the card provides a host of premium benefits such as pre-trip assistance, hotel reservation, flight booking, entertainment and sports booking, gift assistance, and others all with a single phone call.

Platinum auto assist service: To make sure your journey on the road is uninterrupted, IndusInd Bank provides various 24X7 on-road services at a simple phone call. You can avail roadside repair service, emergency fuel supply, battery service, flat tire service, and a host of other services.

Lifestyle benefits: IndusInd Bank in partnership with Bookmyshow offers free movie tickets for Platinum cardholders. Bookmyshow offers 'Buy one, get one free' movie ticket every month. You can avail up to 2 free movie tickets every month.

Fuel surcharge waiver: You can free yourself from surcharge charged on petrol purchases at fuel stations across India with IndusInd Bank's surcharge waiver facility. The 1% surcharge waiver is applicable on all the fuel transactions worth between Rs.400 and Rs.4,000.

Zero liability on lost or stolen card: With the 'Total Protect' program, IndusInd Bank provides complete protection against any unauthorised transactions that happen in case of loss or stolen card. The insurance covers up to 48 days prior to loss reporting.

Personal air accident insurance: Cardholders will get personal air accident cover worth Rs.25 lakh completely free with the card.

sections.title: Credit limit on the IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card

elements.body: Your credit limit on the Platinum Credit Card would be decided by IndusInd Bank based on several parameters like your income, credit history, repaying capacity, etc. The same would be communicated to you at the time of issuance of the card.

sections.title: Reward Points on the IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card

elements.body:
• On every Rs.150 spent on the card, you earn 1.5 reward points.
  • The reward points are offered on all types of spends except fuel transactions.

sections.title: IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card Reward Points Redemption

elements.body:
• The accrued reward points can be redeemed for gift vouchers from Indus Moments, Airline Miles and cash credit.
  • Visit the IndusInd Bank Platinum Card page to redeem the reward points.

sections.title: Eligibility to Apply for the IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card

elements.body: To apply for the card, you should have a good credit score and a stable source of income. The precise eligibility criteria would be communicated to you at the time of applying for the card.

sections.title: Documents needed to Apply for the IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card

elements.body: You would have to submit your income proof, address proof, and identity proof to get the Platinum credit card. The exact list of documents would be communicated to you at the time of applying for the card.

sections.title: How to Apply for the IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card Online?

elements.body:
You can apply for IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card directly from the IndusInd Bank's official website.

Alternatively, you can also apply for the card online through the BankBazaar website by following the steps listed below.

  • On the BankBazaar IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card page, click on the 'Check Eligibility' button.
  • Enter the information asked for.
  • Once your eligibility is confirmed, you can apply for the card in the next step.
  • Enter all the relevant information, upload documents, and submit them.
  • Use the Application ID that you would receive to track the status of your application.

faq.title: FAQs on the IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card

items.question: What are the conditions to avail the fuel surcharge waiver on the Platinum Credit Card?
items.answer: You get a fuel surcharge waiver of 1% when you use your card at petrol pumps across the country. This offer only applies to transactions between Rs.400 to Rs.4,000.

items.question: How do I contact IndusInd Bank credit card customer care?
items.answer: Dial 1860 267 7777 to contact the customer care centre of IndusInd Bank.

items.question: How do I avail the concierge services with my IndusInd Bank Platinum Credit Card?
items.answer: To avail the concierge services, contact IndusInd Bank's Concierge Desk at 1860 267 7777.

sections.title: Jet Airways IndusInd Voyage Visa Credit Card Features and Benefits

elements.body:
This card comes with a wide range of travel benefits and rewards apt for the frequent travellers. Here are some of the features of Jet Airways IndusInd Voyage Visa Credit Card:

  • Welcome gift: You will get a complimentary membership to Jet Airways' Jet Privilege - Frequent flier program in Blue tier category. You will also get a promo code which can be used to waive off the base fare on domestic one-way tickets booked on Jet Airways website. Further, cardholders are entitled to bonus JPMiles that will be credited to JetPrivilege membership account.
  • Jet Airways benefits: Use promo code "JTINDS" to get 5% discount on base fare for domestic and international flight tickets booked online at jetairways.com and jetkonnect.com.
  • Reward points program:
  • You will earn 2 reward points as JPMiles for every Rs.100 spent on the card on weekdays (Mon - Fri) and 3 points on weekends.
  • Utility bill and insurance payments attract 2 JPMiles.
  • Transactions made on Jet Airways website will attract 4 reward points on weekdays and 6 reward points on weekends.
  • The maximum number of JPMiles earned in a year are capped at 50,000. You can earn additional miles by paying an uncapping annual fee of Rs.7,500.
  • JPMiles can be redeemed for flight ticket bookings on Jet Airways and to upgrade flight ticket class from Economy to Business, Business to First class.
  • Golf privileges: As a privileged card member you can avail complimentary golf games and lessons exclusively conducted at leading golf clubs in Bengaluru, Ahmedabad, Chennai, Hyderabad, Delhi, Pune and Mumbai.
  • Travel benefits:

    Complimentary membership to Priority Pass Program that provides access to more than 600 airport lounges across the globe. You need to pay only the usage fee of the lounge.

  • Travel Plus program provides special waivers on lounge usage charges outside India. You can avail the usage fee waiver up to 8 times in a year.
  • Travel insurance: ICICI Lombard General Insurance provides comprehensive travel insurance cover to all the Voyage Visa Credit Cardholders. The insurance cover includes lost baggage cover of Rs.1 lakh, delayed baggage cover worth Rs.25,000, lost or stolen passport cover worth Rs.50,000, loss of ticket cover worth Rs.25,000 and missed connection cover worth Rs.25,000.
  • Fuel surcharge waiver: You can free yourself from surcharge charged on petrol purchases at fuel stations across India with IndusInd Bank's surcharge waiver facility. The waiver is applicable on all the fuel transactions worth between Rs.400 and Rs.4,000.
  • Complimentary concierge services: Through 24x7 concierge services, the card provides a host of premium benefits such as pre-trip assistance, hotel reservation, flight booking, entertainment and sports booking, gift assistance, on-road repair service, emergency fuel supply, battery service, accident management, medical assistance, emergency towing assistance and others all with a single phone call. Cardholders can avail concierge services from anywhere in the world.
  • Zero liability on lost or stolen card: With 'Total Protect' program, IndusInd Bank provides complete protection against any unauthorised transactions that happen in case of loss or stolen card. The insurance covers up to 48 days prior to loss reporting.
  • Personal air accident insurance: Cardholders will get personal air accident cover worth Rs.25 lakh completely free with the card.

sections.title: Eligibility and Documents for IndusInd Voyage Visa Credit Card

elements.body:
• The applicant should be an Indian resident aged at least 18 years.
  • The applicant will be asked to submit an identity proof, an address proof, proof of income and a filled application form.
  • Do make an enquiry with IndusInd Bank about the income requirements and other documentation requirements before proceeding with the application.

sections.title: How to apply for Jet Airways Voyage Visa Card from IndusInd Bank?

elements.body:
You can apply for Jet Airways Voyage Visa Credit Card directly from IndusInd Bank's official website. Follow the instructions mentioned below to apply for the card online.

  • Visit www.indusind.com
  • From the menu choose Personal > I'm interested in > Cards > Credit Cards
  • You will be redirected to IndusInd Bank credit cards page on which you can find 'Jet Airways Voyage Visa Credit Card' by scrolling down
  • Click on the card name to find the features and benefits of the card in detail. You can also compare the card with other credit cards offered by the bank using the 'Add to Compare' option on the page
  • Once done, click on 'Apply Now' button to apply for the card
  • Enter required details such as your current location, date of birth, employment details and others and click on 'Submit'
  • Your interest to apply for the card is then submitted to the bank. Once the bank receives the application, it will approach you on your mobile or e-mail. It will initially check your eligibility to apply for the card and if found eligible will inform you about the next steps in the application process.
  • Alternatively, you can also apply through Bank Bazaar website. In BankBazaar homepage, visit the credit card section. You will have the option to explore all credit cards and also check the eligibility for each card. Once you have specified your requirements, BankBazaar's wizardry will make a list of card that suits your needs. You can select Apply and fill in your details to immediately apply for the card.

faq.title: FAQs Jet Airways IndusInd Voyage Visa Card:

items.question: Explain about the travel insurance that comes with Jet Airways Voyage Visa Card
items.answer: IndusInd Bank has tied up with ICICI Lombard to provide insurance cover against lost baggage, lost ticket, loss of passport and delayed baggage.

items.question: Do I get a fuel surcharge waiver when I use my card to make a fuel purchase?
items.answer: Yes. All cardholders are offered a fuel surcharge waiver of 1% for transactions above Rs.400 valid at any petrol station across India.

items.question: Tell me more about the Priority Pass travel program
items.answer: With priority pass travel program, cardholders can access over 600 airport lounges across the world. The membership fee for the program worth US$99 will be waived off. You just need to pay the usage fee to access any of the Priority Pass lounges located across the globe.

items.question: What should I do in the unfortunate event of loss or theft of my card?
items.answer: Contact the bank using the toll-free number or visit the nearest branch as soon as possible. Total Protect scheme will cover you against fraudulent transactions after you report the loss of the card.

items.question: Do I also have an air accident cover?
items.answer: Yes. All customers are offered a complimentary personal travel insurance cover of up to Rs.25 lakh.

sections.title: HDFC Regalia Credit Card

elements.body:
Among the top tier of credit cards offered by HDFC Bank, the Regalia card comes with a host of lifestyle and travel rewards. Enjoy joining benefits, complimentary lounge access and more across categories such as travel, dining and shopping.

Enabled with contactless technology, the credit card allows fast, convenient and secure payments. Listed below are the features and benefits offered by HDFC Regalia Credit Card with other useful information.

sections.title: Key Highlights of the HDFC Regalia Credit Card

elements.body:
• Annual spending benefits: Spend Rs.5 lakh or more in an anniversary year and earn 10,000 reward points. Earn 5,000 additional reward points if spends in the year equal Rs.8 lakh or more.
  • Fast and secure payments: With an inbuilt contactless payment technology, the Regalia Credit Card allows quick and secure transactions at retail terminals that do not require a PIN. Cardholders can simply tap the card at the device to process the transaction. The minimum transaction amount required to process a contactless payment is Rs.2,000. Any amount less than that would require you to input the PIN.
  • Exclusive dining benefits: With an HDFC Regalia Credit Card, you can enjoy exclusive dining privileges at 3000+ restaurants across the country. You can avail up to 15% discount on the bill every time you dine-out. The list of eligible restaurants in each city is available on the HDFC website.
  • Rewards programme: Earn rewards faster with your Regalia card. Redeem your accrued points for attractive gifts and rewards available exclusively for Regalia cardholders. What's more, you can convert your reward points into air miles, redeemable across leading national and international airlines.
  • Interest-free period: Enjoy up to 50 days of interest-free period provided the entire due from the previous month is cleared on time.
  • Foreign currency mark-up fee: Enjoy a low foreign currency mark-up fee of 2% when you use your card overseas.

sections.title: Benefits and Features of the HDFC Regalia Credit Card

elements.body:
• Fuel surcharge waiver: Fuel surcharge is waived off on fuel transactions made on your card. Fuel transactions worth Rs.400 to Rs.5,000 are eligible for the waiver with a monthly surcharge waiver capped at Rs.500 per billing cycle.
  • Airport privileges: Enjoy complimentary Club Vistara Silver membership applicable for the primary cardholder. Enjoy priority check-in and waitlist clearance, additional baggage allowance and an option to earn 9 Club Vistara points on every Rs.100 spent on the card.
Please note:Club Vistara Silver membership has been discontinued for Regalia cards issued from 20th March, 2019. Existing cardholders can avail of this membership until expiry.
  • Complimentary Zomato Gold membership: Enjoy Zomato Gold membership for 1 year at no charge with your card. Also enjoy up to 2 drinks at no extra fee when you dine at participating restaurants.

Please note: Zomato Gold membership is valid only for Regalia cards issued after 20th March, 2019 and is limited to the primary cardholder.

  • Complimentary airport lounge visits: With a complimentary Priority Pass membership, enjoy access to more than 1,000 airport lounges across the globe. The primary member along with the add-on credit cardholder will get 6 complimentary visits to lounges outside India in a calendar year.
  • Cardholders can also enjoy complimentary access to domestic airport lounges, through the Regalia Visa/MasterCard Credit Card Lounge program. The programme provides 12 free visits to domestic airport lounges in a calendar year.
  • Travel concierge services: HDFC Bank provides travel concierge assistance service to all its Regalia Credit Card users helping them to customise their travel experience. The travel concierge will help the cardholder in making airline reservations, hotel room bookings, movie bookings and other services.
  • Comprehensive air travel cover: Your HDFC Regalia credit card comes with free insurance cover that protects the primary cardholder in case of air accidents. Card members are eligible for air accident death cover of Rs.1 crore, emergency overseas hospitalisation cover of Rs.15 lakh and credit liability cover worth Rs.9 lakh.

HDFC Regalia Credit Card LimitThe card limit is at the discretion of the bank and dependent on factors such as your credit score and credit history.

HDFC Regalia Reward Point BenefitsEarn 4 reward points on every Rs.150 you spend on your card.

HDFC Regalia Reward Point RedemptionReward points earned on your Regalia card expire within 2 years of accumulation. You can redeem your existing points by following the steps below:

  • Visit the dedicated HDFC Regalia portal (www.hdfcregalia.com) and choose from the list of redemption options.
  • Alternatively, you can also choose from the options listed under the 'SmartBuy' section on the HDFC Bank website or on NetBanking.
  • Select the voucher/reward and confirm your selection, after which the points stand redeemed.

sections.title: HDFC Regalia Credit Card Eligibility and Documentation

elements.body:
The eligibility criteria as well as documents to be submitted are listed below:

  • Salaried professionals should be aged 21 years and above but below 60 years. Income should be more than Rs.1.2lakh per month.
  • Self-employed applicants should be aged 21 years and above but below 65 years. Annual income should be more than Rs.12 lakh.
  • Income proof, address proof and identity proof documents are to be submitted as per the bank's request.

sections.title: How To Apply For Regalia Credit Card Online

elements.body:
Apply for a HDFC Regalia credit card online by following the steps below:
  • Visit the HDFC Bank website and choose the 'Regalia' card from among the options listed.
  • Click on the 'Apply Online' button.
  • You will be redirected to an online web form, where you need to fill in the required details such as name, mobile number, e-mail ID, company name, monthly income, etc.
  • Check the box that authorises the bank representatives to contact you and click on 'Submit'.
  • Once HDFC receives your application, you will receive a phone call or SMS on your registered mobile number. If you're eligible to apply for the card, the application process will be informed to you over the call and you can follow the same to apply for Regalia Credit Card.

items.question: How do I earn reward points on Regalia Credit Card?
items.answer: You can earn reward points by making transactions using your Regalia Credit Card. Only retail spends are eligible for the reward points. Fuel transactions and EasyEMI transactions are not eligible for reward points. The accrued reward points will have an expiry of 2 years before which they should be redeemed for various gifts available on the rewards catalogue.

items.question: Do I earn reward points for international flight bookings made using Regalia Credit Card?
items.answer: Yes, you earn reward points for all domestic and international airlines bookings.

items.question: Can I recharge my mobile on the Regalia online platform?
items.answer: Yes, you can access the HDFC Regalia online portal and recharge your prepaid mobile phone.

items.question: How can I make payments for the HDFC Regalia card?
items.answer: You can make payments for your credit card through multiple payment options like auto pay, funds transfer, Net Banking, mobile banking, etc.

items.question: I misplaced my Regalia credit card. What do I do?
items.answer: If you have misplaced/lost your card, simply call the Credit Card Customer Care division and notify them of the same. Your card will be blocked instantly. Alternatively, you can report a lost/stolen card through your NetBanking account.

sections.title: Key Features of the JetPrivilege HDFC Bank World Credit Card

elements.body:
The JetPrivilege credit card is a co-branded card with HDFC Bank and Jet Airways which offers first-class travel privileges and other exclusive benefits for the customers of the bank. This credit card is curated specifically for the frequent traveller and is one of the best offered by HDFC Bank.

However, given the recent updates from Jet Airways, as they have decided to suspend operations, your JPMiles can still be used.

Since Jet Airways is also partially owned by Etihad Airways, your JPMiles can be used to buy tickets from any of the partner airlines of Jet Airways such as Delta, AeroMexico, Etihad Airways, Air France, Air Canada, and Virgin Atlantic.

The airline company also has its airline running in Europe. One way or return flight tickets can be purchased to and from Amsterdam, London, and Paris.

  • A welcome benefit of 7,500 JPMiles.
  • Get 3,000 JPMiles with your first swipe of the credit card.
  • Enjoy access to more than 600 airport lounges in the world with the Priority Pass Membership.
  • The renewal fee is waived if the annual spends on the card are more than Rs.3 lakh.
  • Fuel surcharge waiver of 1.5%.
  • Avail interest-free credit for up to 50 days from the date of purchase.

sections.title: Features and Benefits of the JetPrivilege HDFC Bank World Credit Card

elements.body:
Welcome Benefits

  • Enjoy a welcome bonus of 7,500 JPMiles. 3,750 JPMiles will be added on your first transaction.
  • 2,250 JPMiles will be added if you spend Rs.75,000 or more within 3 months from card issuance.
  • Avail a discount voucher of Rs.750 on return air tickets.

Renewal Benefits

  • Once renewed, JetPrivilege World cardholders can get 3,000 JPMiles.

JPMiles Accrual Program

  • On every Rs.150 spent on your retail purchases with your JetPrivilege credit card, get 6 JPMiles.
  • Get 18 JPMiles on every Rs.150 spent on flight ticket bookings with your card.

Lifestyle Benefits

  • With the complimentary Priority Pass Membership, cardholders will have access to more than 600 airport lounges all over the world.
  • Enjoy lounge facilities such as telephone, high-speed internet, conference rooms, etc.
  • Make the most of the MasterCard Lounge Program and get 4 complimentary lounge visits per quarter. To check the list of partner airport lounges, it is advised to visit the website.
  • Avail 4 complimentary airport lounge visits per quarter with the Visa Lounge Program.

Renewal Fee Benefits

  • If you spend more than Rs.3 lakh within a year from the date the card was issued, the renewal fee for the next year is waived off.

sections.title: JetPrivilege HDFC Bank World Credit Card Limit

elements.body: The credit limit of the JetPrivilege card is at the discretion of the bank. HDFC Bank considers a number of factors before setting a credit limit such as the credit score of the primary cardholder, the credit report as well as current and past repayment history.

sections.title: Latest Offers by JetPrivilege HDFC World Credit Card

elements.body:
• Avail 20% discount on a minimum purchase of Rs.999 at Ferns n Petals with the voucher code FNPHDFC20.
  • Add the coupon code HDFC250 and get a flat discount of Rs.250 on your purchases at Grofers. Offer is valid between 1st and 7th of every month.
  • Enjoy a discount of 40% on a minimum purchase of Rs.999 at Myntra.
  • Use the coupon code ZOMATOHDFC and avail a cashback of up to 25% on a minimum order of Rs.500 on Zomato.
  • Use the coupon code GOHDFC and get a flat discount of up to Rs.1,000 on a minimum transaction value of up to Rs.8,000.
  • Get a discount of Rs.600 on your next domestic flight booking from ixigo.com on minimum booking value of Rs.3,500.

sections.title: Reward Point Benefits on the JetPrivilege HDFC World Credit Card

elements.body:
• Earn 6 JPMiles on every Rs.150 spent on various retail expenses with your credit card.
  • Avail 18 JPMiles for every Rs.150 spent on booking flight tickets on jetairways.com.

sections.title: How to Redeem Reward Points earned on JetPrivilege HDFC World Credit Card?

elements.body:
For all the transactions done with this credit card, you will be receiving JPMiles instead of reward points. Hence the JPMiles can be redeemed at the Jet Privilege website by adding your Jet Privilege number.

To know more, it is advised that you contact the customer care of Jet Privilege or HDFC Bank.

sections.title: Eligibility of the JetPrivilege HDFC Bank World Credit Card

elements.body:
• Primary applicant must be between the ages of 21 years and 60 years if salaried to apply for the card.
  • If self-employed, the primary cardholder must be between the ages of 21 years and 65 years to apply for the card.
  • The age of the add-on cardholder must be at least 15 years.
  • The primary applicant can be a resident or a non-resident of India.

elements.body:
• A copy of your Form 60 or PAN card.
  • 2 passport size coloured photographs.
  • A copy of your original address proof which can be Aadhaar card, Passport or electricity bill.
  • Proof of income which can include a copy of your IT returns, latest salary slips or Form 16.
  • Copies of your ID proof which can be Aadhaar card, passport or driving license.

sections.title: How to Apply for the JetPrivilege HDFC Bank World Credit Card?

elements.body:
You can apply for this credit card through offline or online methods. To apply for the card, you can visit the branch of HDFC Bank, fill the application and submit it there or you can also call the customer care to apply for the card.

However, if you wish to apply for the card online, you can visit the website of HDFC Bank and apply for the card or you can do so through the BankBazaar website.

To apply for the card through BankBazaar, here are the steps which you need to follow:

  • Click on the 'check eligibility' tab on the page of JetPrivilege HDFC Bank World credit card on BankBazaar.
  • Add the information which is asked in the application.
  • You will need to upload the adequate documents requested during the procedure.
  • Once you click on 'submit', the website will send you a tracking ID. This ID number will help you check the application status for the credit card.

faq.title: JetPrivilege HDFC Bank World Credit Card FAQs

items.question: After swiping my card, how long does it take for the JPMiles to be added to my account?
items.answer: Post the first swipe, it takes just 7 days. However, later swipes at retail outlets (as part of the JPMiles Programme) will accumulate JPMiles will be credited to your account within 45 working days.

items.question: My card was stolen. What must I do?
items.answer: You will have to intimate the Credit Cards Customer Service immediately about the loss of card. After this, all charges and activity on this stolen/lost card will not be attributed to you. Next, a replacement card will be arranged for you.

items.question: How do I earn reward points on my JetPrivilege HDFC Bank World Credit Card?
items.answer: The reward points here are the JPMiles, and these are earned whenever you swipe your card at any retail outlet as part of the purchase of a product/service. The accumulated points are credited to your JPMiles account and can be redeemed accordingly.

items.question: What are the types of retail outlets wherein I can use my card?
items.answer: The JetPrivilege HDFC Bank World Credit Card can be used at any retail outlet that accepts cards. You can use it at the movies, for travel, shopping, online transactions, etc.

items.question: How can I pay my monthly dues for the JetPrivilege HDFC Bank World Credit Card?
items.answer: Just as you would do for a normal credit card- by cash, cheque, at the ATM or via net banking.

sections.title: Key Highlights of the HDFC Diners Club Rewards Credit Card

elements.body:
Some credit cards reward only a few types of spends, the HDFC Diners Club Rewardz Credit Card is not one of those cards.

This credit card rewards all your spending, no matter how trivial. You earn reward points that you can redeem for travel, lifestyle, retail, and entertainment vouchers. All for an annual fee of Rs.1,000 (excluding taxes).

  • Get 3 Reward Points for every Rs.150 that you spend.
  • 1,000 Reward Points as a welcome gift and 1,000 Reward Points each year you pay the annual fee.
  • Choose from over 150 airlines and hotels when making bookings via www.hdfcdinersclub.com.

sections.title: Features and Benefits of the HDFC Diners Club Rewardz Credit Card

elements.body:
Welcome Benefit and Renewal Benefit

  • 1,000 Reward Points when you sign-up for the card. This way you can start accumulating points at an accelerated pace.
  • You also get 1,000 Reward Points each year, when you pay the annual fee and renew your card membership.

Reward Points

  • You get 3 Reward Points for every Rs.150 that you spend.
  • There is no cap on the number of points you can earn.

Travel Benefits

  • Choose from over 150 airline and hotel partners when you book your travel and hotel stays on the Diners Club website.
  • Redeem your reward points for air tickets or hotel stays (1 Reward Point = 0.30 air miles).
  • Transfer your Reward Points to various frequent flyer programmes such as Jet Privilege and KrisFlyer miles.

Lifestyle Benefits

  • Get access to a 24/7 concierge service and have all your travel requests taken care of.
  • To access this service, you need to call: 1800 209 4006.

sections.title: HDFC Diners Club Rewardz Credit Card Limit

elements.body:
The limit on your credit card is the total amount you can spend without incurring any over-limit penalties.

This limit is usually intimated to you by the bank when your application has been approved. Moreover, the credit limit for the same card may differ from person to person since several factors go into determining the limit on your card. These include your employment status, your annual income, your current debt obligations, the number of credit cards you currently own, your repayment history, and of course, your credit score.

Based on all of these factors (and more), the bank will determine the credit limit on your card.

sections.title: Latest Offers on Your HDFC Diners Club Rewardz Credit Card

elements.body:
• Get up to 40% off at selected restaurants courtesy of HDFC Good Food Trail.
  • Enjoy savings up to 10% (maximum savings of Rs.400) on a minimum transaction of Rs.1,000 on D Mart Ready's website and their mobile application using PayZapp (valid until 5 May 2020).
  • 10% off on bookings made on Isprava Villas (valid until 1 March 2020).

sections.title: Reward Point Benefits with Your HDFC Diners Club Rewardz Credit Card

elements.body:
There are two ways you can earn Reward Points with your card.

  • You earn 3 Reward Points per Rs.150 you spend (only eligible transactions will be rewarded points).
  • You can earn points in an accelerated manner by signing up for the card and then paying your annual fee.
    • Signing-up for the card gives you 1,000 Reward Points and renewing your card membership gives you 1,000 Reward Points.

sections.title: How to Redeem Reward Points Earned

elements.body:
There are plenty of redemption options before you. Here's how you can redeem the points you earn:

  • Convert your points to air miles and transfer the miles to the frequent flyer programme of your choice.
  • Redeem your points for rewards from the HDFC Bank Diner's Club Rewardz catalogue.

The steps involved in redeeming your points are:

  • Login to your HDFC net banking account.
  • Register your credit card (if you haven't already).
  • Select 'Redeem Reward Points' and continue to the online redemption portal.
  • On the portal, select 'Redeem Reward Points' once again, set the points range, and then view the catalogue.
  • Add to cart the product or products that you would like to redeem your points for.
  • Before you check out, make sure that your address and email ID is correct since the product will be delivered to the registered address.
  • Once all details have been confirmed, select 'Redeem'.
  • Take note of the redemption order number since you will need it for all communication regarding this order.

The steps to convert your Reward Points to air miles are:

  • Login to your net banking account.
  • Register your card.
  • Select 'Redeem Reward Points'. You will be redirected to the online redemption portal.
  • Once here, navigate to the section which allows you to convert points to air miles.
  • You will be given the option of transferring your points to JetPrivilege or KrisFlyer. Choose the frequent flyer programme you are a member of.
  • Enter all the required details.
  • Your Reward Points will then be transferred to the concerned frequent flyer programme.

sections.title: Eligibility for HDFC Diner Club Rewardz Credit Card

elements.body:
Both salaried and self-employed individuals can apply for this card. The eligibility criteria for this credit card are:

Salaried Individuals:

  • Minimum age: 21 years
  • Maximum age: 60 years
  • Net monthly income: Greater than Rs.30,000 per month

Self-employed Individuals

elements.body:
The documents required may vary from each category of applicant. But in general, here are the documents that you may require:

  • Identity-related documents: Including but not limited to PAN card, Aadhaar card, passport, and driver's licence.
  • Address proof: Including but not limited to your Aadhaar card and passport.
  • Income-related documents: Including but not limited to your latest payslip, income tax returns, and Form 16.

sections.title: How to Apply for the HDFC Diners Club Rewardz Credit Card Online

elements.body:
You can apply for this card on the bank's website.

Once you select the 'Apply Now' button on the HDFC Diners Club Rewardz Credit Card webpage, you will be redirected to the online application form.

Enter the required details such as your name, phone number, income details, and PAN details. Once you submit your application, you will receive an SMS or a call from a bank official regarding the status of your application.

faq.title: HDFC Diners Club Rewardz Credit Card Frequently Asked Questions

items.question: What is the validity of my Reward Points?
items.answer: The Reward Points you earn are valid for 2 years from the date on which you earn them. This means that points earned in June 2019, will expire in June 2021.

items.question: How long will it take for my air miles redemption request to be processed?
items.answer: It will take at least 7 working days to transfer your Reward Points to air miles.

items.question: Can I get a waiver on the annual fee?
items.answer: Yes, you can get a waiver on the annual fee from the second year onwards. To be eligible for the waiver, you will have to charge a minimum of Rs.1 lakh to your card in the previous year.

items.question: Will I still get the renewal benefit of 1,000 Reward Points even if the annual fee is waived?
items.answer: No. If your annual fee is waived, you will not receive the renewal benefit of 1,000 Reward Points.

items.question: Is there any cap on the Reward Points I earn?
items.answer: No, there is no cap on the 3 Reward Points per Rs.150 that you earn. However, with respect to insurance transactions, the Reward Points are capped at 2,000 points per transaction.

sections.title: Key Highlights of the HDFC Bank Diners Premium Credit Card

elements.body:
• Make hotel reservations and book flight tickets from the diners club website.
  • On paying the annual fee of the card, get a welcome bonus of 2,500 reward points.
  • Enjoy complimentary access to domestic and international airport lounges.

  • Earn 10X reward points on international spends.
  • For every Rs.150 spent, earn 4 reward points.

sections.title: Features and Benefits of the HDFC Bank Diners Premium Credit Card

elements.body:
Annual Fee Waiver

  • On spending more than Rs.3 lakh in a year, the annual fee for the next year is waived off.

Travel Benefits

  • The primary cardholder can book airline tickets and make a hotel reservation at more than 150 airlines and choice of domestic and international hotels.
  • Enable your credit card for international usage. With this, you can upgrade your international daily limit through Net Banking.
  • Enjoy up to 6 complimentary lounge visits in a year at airports in India and abroad with the Exclusive Lounge Program.

Reward Point Benefits

Lifestyle Benefits

  • With the Diners Premium credit card, you get exclusive Concierge privileges.

  • All the representatives of this service speak English and are multilingual.

Insurance Benefits

HDFC Bank takes several factors into consideration before deciding on the limit to be given to the primary applicant. The factors which are majorly considered are the credit score, the credit report of the applicant along with the repayment behaviour of past and current loans.

sections.title: How to redeem reward points earned on the HDFC Bank Diners Premium Credit Card

elements.body:
You can redeem your reward points through online or offline methods. If you wish to do so offline, you can download the rewards redemption form from the HDFC Bank website. The details will need to be filled and sent to the following address:

Rewards Helpdesk,

HDFC Bank Cards Division,

P.O. Box No. 8654,

Thiruvanmiyur, P.O.,

Chennai - 600041.

You can also log in to your Net banking account and redeem your reward points online as well. To do so, here are the steps you need to follow:

  • Once everything checks out, you are required to read the terms and condition and check the box.
  • Once done, click on 'redeem'. The redemption order number which is given must be noted down for future references.

An applicant can apply for the credit card through offline or online methods. If you wish to apply offline, you will need to visit the bank branch, fill the application form and submit the documents required to apply.

HDFC Bank Diner Premium Credit Card FAQs

  • How much airmiles can I earn against each Reward Point?

Each Reward Point will help you earn 0.70 airmiles.

  • Will I be awarded Reward Points on fuel transactions?

No, you will not be awarded Reward Points on fuel transactions.

  • If I use the revolving credit facility on my HDFC Bank Diners Club Premium Credit Card and do not pay the total amount due at the end of the billing cycle. Will I be charged interest on the total outstanding balance?

If you use the revolving credit facility on your HDFC Bank Diners Club Premium Credit Card and do not pay the total amount due at the end of the billing cycle, then yes you will be charged interest on the total outstanding balance plus on every new transaction that you make using the card. The interest will be charged until you pay back the full amount.

  • What is the value of Reward Points?

1 Reward Point is equal to Rs.0.75.

  • How to find more information about HDFC Bank Diners Club Premium Credit Card?

To find more information about HDFC Bank Diners Club Premium Credit Card, you have to visit the website of HDFC Bank Diners Club. You can also visit any branch of the bank or contact on the helpline number to get details.

sections.title: Key Highlights of the JetPrivilege HDFC Bank Platinum Credit Card

elements.body:
• Get up to 3,000 JPMiles as a welcome gift.
  • Enjoy 4 JPMiles per Rs.150 spent on eligible transactions.

sections.title: Features and Benefits of This Card

elements.body:
This card gives you the opportunity to travel and live in style. Here's how:

Earn JPMiles

Here's how you can earn JPMiles on your card:

  • Get 4 JPMiles per Rs.150 that you spend (only on eligible retail transactions).
  • Earn JPMiles on transactions made on JetPrivilege.

JPMiles Redemption on Jet Privilege

You can't redeem your JPMiles for Jet Airways' flights, but you can redeem them for partner flights such as Etihad and Air India among others.

Here are other ways to redeem your JPMiles:

  • Redeem them for free flight tickets from selected domestic and international airline partners.
  • Fill up on free fuel with fuel redemption at participating outlets.
  • Use your JPMiles to stay at hotels from across the globe including Palazzo Versace Dubai and La Maison Champs Elyses (Paris).
  • Redeem miles for merchandise and gift vouchers from the Reward Store.

Other Redemption Options

  • Redeem accumulated JPMiles for shopping vouchers from Flipkart, Amazon, Lifestyle, Shoppers Stop, Croma, and others.
  • Fill fuel for free at select Indian Oil outlets in Delhi, Bangalore, Chennai, and Mumbai.

Welcome Bonus

  • Start your JPMiles journey with up to 3,000 JPMiles.
    • Get 1,500 JPMiles when you swipe your card for the first time (on transactions of Rs.150 or more) within 90 days of your card being set up.
    • Spend Rs.50,000 or more within 90 days of your card being set up and earn another 1,500 JPMiles.

Renewal Benefits

Pay the annual fee, renew your card membership, and enjoy the following:

  • Earn up to 1,500 JPMiles when you use your card within 90 days of your membership being renewed (minimum transaction amount is Rs.150).

Lounge Access

Get access to airport lounges courtesy your JetPrivilege HDFC Bank Platinum Credit Card. You get:

  • Access to domestic lounges at select airports in India.
    • Visa Lounge Programme: Up to 2 free visits each year at participating domestic airport lounges.
    • Mastercard Lounge Programme: Up to 2 free visits each year at select domestic airport lounges.

Insurance Coverage

Make a minimum of 4 transactions of Rs.100 or more each calendar month and get:

  • Up to Rs.50 lakh complimentary accidental death insurance coverage.

Moreover, if you buy assets worth Rs.5,000 or more using your JetPrivilege HDFC Bank Platinum Credit Card, you get:

  • Complimentary fire and burglary protection for a period of 180 days from the date of purchase. The insurance amounts are:
    • Rs.25,000 for personal portable equipment.
    • Up to Rs.2 lakh for all other assets.

Note: For the insurance to kick in, you will have to declare loss or damage of the product to the bank within 48 hours.

Zero Liability

If you lose your card or discover that it has been stolen, report the loss to HDFC's customer care centre, and enjoy zero liability on any fraudulent transactions made using your card.

Interest-Free Credit and Revolving Credit Facility

You get up to 50 days of interest-free credit with this card and a revolving credit facility with an interest rate of 3.49% per month.

Contactless Payments

Enjoy contactless payment facility with the card so you can just tap and go.

sections.title: JetPrivilege HDFC Bank Platinum Credit Card

elements.body: The credit card limit will be set by the bank after taking into consideration factors such as your income, your credit history, employment status, age, and your credit score.

sections.title: Latest Offers You Can Enjoy with Your JetPrivilege HDFC Bank Platinum Credit Card

elements.body:
• Pay your insurance via Easy EMI with zero processing fees. This offer is valid only on payments made to select insurance providers.
  • Up to 20% off at participating restaurants.
  • Get 25% (up to Rs.100, once a month, redeemable twice) off on movie tickets for screenings at Inox.

sections.title: Reward Point Benefits

elements.body:
With your JetPrivilege HDFC Bank Platinum Credit Card, you get 4 JPMiles per Rs.150 spent on eligible retail transactions.

Purchases made on JetPrivilege also earn you JPMiles.

Do remember that JPMiles earned cannot be converted to HDFC reward points.

sections.title: How to Redeem Your JPMIles

elements.body:
Your JPMiles can be redeemed on the JetPrivilege website. To redeem your miles:

  • Register or log into JetPrivilege.
  • Select the category for which you would like to redeem your JPMiles (flights, hotels, shop, dine, cards).
  • Select the 'Redeem Now' option.
  • Depending on the category you have selected you will be shown the number of miles required for redemption.
  • Choose from the available options.
  • Redeem your miles.

If you don't have enough miles for what you are looking for, you can opt to pay partly by miles and partly by cash.

faq.title: JetPrivilege HDFC Bank Platinum Credit Card FAQs

items.question: Which account do my JPMiles get transferred to?
items.answer: All JPMiles that you earn get transferred to your JetPrivilege frequent flyer programme.

items.question: Can I still use JPMiles even though Jet Airways flights are grounded?
items.answer: Yes. JPMiles are a part of Jet's frequent flyer programme - Jet Privilege. This is independent of Jet Airways and is owned partly by Etihad. As such, you can still continue earning and using your JPMiles.

items.question: When will I get bonus JPMiles?
items.answer: The bonus JPMiles that are a part of your welcome bonus, will be credited to your frequent flyer programme within 7 days of you swiping your card.

items.question: On average, how much can I save each year if I use this card?
items.answer: You can save around Rs.5,000 each year on fuel transactions and air ticket purchases when you use this card.

items.question: What is the validity of my JPMiles?
items.answer: With the JetPrivilege HDFC Bank Platinum Credit Card, you enjoy an extended validity of 5 years on your JPMiles earned before 30 June 2018. JPMiles eared post this period do not expire.

sections.title: Key Highlights of HDFC Bank MoneyBack Credit Car

elements.body:

  • Joining fee and annual fee waiver when applied through BankBazaar (T&C apply).

• 2 reward points on retail spends. 2 times more points on online spends.
  • Redeem reward points for cash (100 reward points = Rs.20).

sections.title: Offers on BankBazaar

elements.body:
If you apply for the HDFC MoneyBack Credit Card through BankBazaar, you can enjoy –  

  • Joining fee waiver by opening an HDFC saving or current account within 3 months of card issuance.
  • Renewal fee waiver if the annual spends exceed Rs.50,000.
  • You can also enjoy 100% paperless approval. You don't have to submit any hard copies of the documents required for approval.

sections.title: Features and Benefits

elements.body:
Welcome gift: Apply for the MoneyBack credit card and earn 500 reward points as joining bonus. If you renew your card, you will get 500 more reward points.  

Reward points program 

  • Earn 2 reward points on every Rs.150 spent on the card.
  • 2X more reward points on online spends.
  • Redeem earned reward points for cash back against the card outstanding (100 reward points = Rs.20).
  • Also redeemable for air miles and gifts from exclusive rewards catalogue.
  • Minimum 2,500 points are required for redemption. The accrued points are valid for 2 years from the date of accumulation.

Milestone rewards: Spend Rs.50,000 or more on retail purchases in a quarter and get an e-voucher worth Rs.500. The voucher has a validity of 60 days.  

Special benefits: By conducting a minimum of 4 transactions every month, you will get: 

  • Complimentary accidental death insurance worth Rs.50 lakh
  • Complimentary protection for goods worth above Rs.5000 purchased through the credit card.The offer covers damage or loss caused to the goods due to fire and burglary for 180 days from the date of purchase.

Save on fuel purchases: With the fuel surcharge waiver facility, you can save up to Rs.1,800 every year on your fuel purchases at stations across India. Offer valid on minimum transaction value of Rs.400. 

Zero liability on lost card: After reporting the loss of your credit card, you have zero liability on any fraudulent transactions made using your card.

sections.title: Documents Required

elements.body:
The exact documentation to apply for the MoneyBack credit card is not available on the official website. 

Listed below are the basic documents required to process any credit card application.

  • KYC documents
  • PAN card
  • Income proof such as salary slip or income tax returns
  • Bank statements and others.

sections.title: How to Apply for HDFC MoneyBack Credit Card online?

elements.body:
You can apply for HDFC MoneyBack Credit Card directly from HDFC official website.  

Alternatively, you can also apply on BankBazaar, from the same page you're on, to enjoy the exclusive partner offers.  

Follow the steps to apply now –  

  • Navigate to the top of the page to find 'Check Eligibility' button.
  • Click on it, fill the required details to know your eligibility for the card.
  • If you're eligible, you will find an option to apply for the card.
  • Click on it, submit the required details and documents and press 'Submit'

On successful submission of required documents and details, you will receive an acknowledgement message carrying the application ID. You can use the same to track your credit card application status in the later stage.

items.question: What is the credit limit of HDFC MoneyBack Credit Card?
items.answer: HDFC MoneyBack Credit Card does not come with a pre-set limit. The limit varies for each applicant and is allotted based on his/her income range and credit score.However, the maximum credit limit you can expect on the MoneyBack Credit Card is Rs.1.5 to Rs.2 lakh while the minimum would be Rs.25,000. Once you apply and receive the card, the bank will communicate the credit limit at the time of card disbursal

items.question: Can we take money from HDFC MoneyBack Credit Card to PayZapp without any charges?
items.answer: Yes, you can simply, link your HDFC MoneyBack Credit Card to your PayZapp account to access your card. Once the card is linked, you can either add money to the PayZapp account or directly make the payments by selecting the MoneyBack Credit Card at the time of payment. None of the above-mentioned transactions are chargeable.

items.question: What are the cons of HDFC MoneyBack Credit Card?
items.answer: As the MoneyBack card belongs to the cash back category, the card provides decent money back offers for the price. However, some of the drawbacks of the card include less number of regular reward points as well as accelerated reward points, the requirement of a high number of points for redemption, no lifestyle benefits such as travel, dining, etc.

items.question: How can I redeem my reward points on HDFC MoneyBack card for cash?
items.answer: Reward points on the MoneyBack credit card can be redeemed as cash, gifts and air miles. If you wish to redeem them for cash, you need to have a minimum of 2,500 points. Once you earn them, you can select 'cash' as your redemption option and your card outstanding will be adjusted with the equivalent cash benefit. Every 100 points would give you Rs.20.

items.question: Can I get an add-on card in addition to the primary MoneyBack card?
items.answer: Yes, you can apply for a supplementary card for your immediate family members older than 18 years. The add-on card is free for lifetime and carries all the benefits of the primary card.

  • You can earn 5 reward points on every Rs.150 you spend on any other category.
  • You can avail 20% cashback (Maximum - Rs.600) every month on the amount you spend on Uber rides.
  • You can enjoy exclusive offers from Visa on this Card.

sections.title: Standard Chartered Manhattan Platinum Credit Card Special Offers:

elements.body:
• Make any transaction within 60 days of availing your Standard Chartered Manhattan Platinum Credit Card to get extra 1,000 Reward Points.
  • If you register for online banking, you can get extra 500 points for free.

sections.title: Eligibility Criteria:

elements.body:
• The applicant should be at least 21 years old and no more than 65 years old.
  • He/ she must have a steady monthly income.
  • Applicant must reside in the particular credit cards sourcing city or location of the bank.
  • If you have other credit cards, your payment history will be checked.
  • Applicants can apply on the basis of their Life Insurance policy or other bank's credit card.

sections.title: Documentation:

elements.body:
Applicants will be asked to submit the following documents:

  • Identity Proof – Any one of the following can be submitted as proof of identity:
    • PAN.
    • Passport.
    • Voter ID Card.
    • Government ID.
  • Address Proof – Any one of the following can be submitted as proof of address:
    • Driving License.
    • Passport.
    • Utility Bill.
    • Phone Bill.
    • Rent Agreement.
    • Bank or Credit Card Statement.
  • Income Proof – Any one of the following can be submitted as proof of income:
    • Salaried employees have to submit Recent 1 month's salary slip.
    • Self-employed businessmen have to submit recent ITR (Income Tax Returns) with calculation of income or Certified Financials and proof of Last Business Continuity.
    • Self-employed professionals have to submit recent ITR and proof of Business Continuity.

sections.title: Fees & Waivers:

elements.body:
• Joining Membership Fee is a nominal sum of Rs.499
  • Exclusive Offer - Splurge Rs.30,000 in 1 year and get a rebate on your joining membership fee and if you spend Rs.60,000 in a year using your card, the renewal fee for the coming year will be exempted.
  • Yearly membership fee for the first year is waived off.
  • The renewal membership fee from the second year is Rs.999.

sections.title: How to apply?

elements.body: Go to BankBazaar credit card page. Upon entering your details and requirements, you will be given a list of credit cards to choose from. Click on 'Apply' against Standard Chartered Manhattan Platinum Credit Card to apply.

items.question: How long will it take to apply for Standard Chartered Manhattan Platinum Credit Card?
items.answer: It will take you only a few minutes to apply for a Standard Chartered Manhattan Platinum Credit Card. The bank will provide you with an in-principle decision on the spot. Once you submit all the required docs, it will take up to 7-15 days for the Bank to provide you with the card.

items.question: How do I check my Standard Chartered Manhattan Platinum Credit Card application status?
items.answer: You can check the application status of your Standard Chartered Manhattan Platinum Credit Card on the website of the bank. To check, go to the credit cards section and click on 'Track Credit Card Application'. Enter your details and click on 'Submit'.

items.question: Should I pay extra for using my credit card abroad?
items.answer: Yes, every international transactions are charged with a nominal 3.5% transaction fee.

items.question: Can I get Add-on cards with Standard Chartered Manhattan Platinum Credit Card?
items.answer: Yes, you can get Add-on cards with Standard Chartered Manhattan Platinum Credit Card.

items.question: Where can I get more information about Standard Chartered Manhattan Platinum Credit Card?
items.answer: You can get more information about Standard Chartered Manhattan Platinum Credit Card on the website of the bank. You can also contact the customer care of the bank or visit any of its branch to get the required details.

sections.title: Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card

elements.body: The Super Value Titanium Credit Card has been designed to deliver exciting rewards, offers, and cashback to its users. You get the maximum benefits on using the card for utility and telephone bill payments, fuel purchase, etc.

sections.title: Key Highlights of Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card

elements.body:
• The card gives you cashback on fuel and telephone bills.
  • You also avail cashback on utility bills payment.
  • There's an attractive reward points plan that rewards you on all your purchases.

sections.title: Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card Features and Benefits

elements.body:
Cashback on fuel

  • On fuel transactions of at least Rs.750, you earn 5% cashback. This is applicable to transactions at all fuel stations across the country.
  • The maximum cashback that can be availed per month is Rs.200 (up to Rs.100 per transaction).

Cashback on telecom bill payments

  • When you pay your telephone bills using the card, you enjoy a cashback of 5% on the transaction amount.
  • The maximum cashback that can be availed per month is Rs.200 (up to Rs.100 per transaction). Also, the minimum transaction value should be Rs.750.

Cashback on utility bills

  • As a Super Value Titanium credit cardholder, you can avail a cashback of 5% of up to Rs.100 per month on utility bill payments.
  • The minimum transaction value to avail the offer is Rs.750.

Easy EMI: For every purchase of Rs.5,000 or above, you get the option of converting it to EMIs. Thus, you can easily pay the amount in monthly instalments.

Balance on EMI: You also get the option to convert the entire outstanding balance on the card (up to Rs.5 lakh) into EMIs. Also, you don't have to pay any processing fee to avail this facility.

Easy loans: If you are in need of a loan, you can easily avail one for up to Rs.5 lakh with tenures ranging from 12 to 60 months.

sections.title: Credit Limit on the Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card

elements.body: The credit limit on your card is the maximum amount of credit that the bank extends to you through the card. Your credit limit is set by the bank depending on your monthly income, income stability, and a few other factors. You can get it revised in due course.

sections.title: Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card latest offers

elements.body:
A discount of Rs.200 at Grofers:

  • Use your card to pay for purchases from the Grofers app or website every Thursday and enjoy an instant discount of Rs.200 on your purchases.
  • To avail this offer, the minimum transaction should be Rs.1,500. The offer is valid till 26th March 2020.

Discount on Samsung phones

  • Purchase Samsung smartphones with the card and avail a discount of up to 15%. You also enjoy other benefits like no-cost EMI, third-party insurance, etc.
  • This offer ends on 31 December 2019 and the maximum discount that can be availed is Rs.9,500.

Ola ride benefits

  • Book an Ola ride, pay with your Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card, and earn 10% cashback of up to Rs.300 per month.
  • To avail the offer, you should spend a minimum of Rs.15,000 per month with the card. This offers ends on 10 July 2019.

Discounts on Goibibo

  • Avail discounts of up to Rs.1,200 on Goibibo domestic flight ticket bookings every Monday. For minimum spends of Rs.10,000, Rs.7,000, and Rs.4,000, you earn Rs.1200, Rs.900, and Rs.600 respectively.
  • To avail the offer, use the promo code GOSTANC when booking the tickets. The offer ends on 30 September 2019.

Movie tickets offer

  • As an entertainment offer, when you book INOX tickets for Friday, Saturday, or Sunday, you earn a discount of 25% (up to Rs.150).
  • You also get a discount of 10% on food and beverages. The offer is valid until 3 November 2019.

sections.title: Reward Points Benefits on the Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card

elements.body:
• For every Rs.150 spent on a category other than utility, fuel, and telecom, you earn 1 reward point.
  • If you are a premium banking customer, you get 5X rewards on overseas point-of-sales spends along with a complimentary Priority Pass that gives you access to over 1000 airport lounges across the world with one free access per month.

sections.title: Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card Reward Points Redemption

elements.body:
• The reward points that you accrue on the Super Value Titanium Credit Card can be redeemed for an exciting list of options listed on an online catalogue.
  • You can decide on the number of reward points that you wish to redeem for any particular product.
  • You can also redeem the points to avail discounts on hotels, flights, and other travel packages. With the help of the new mobile platform, the redemption can be done instantly.
