sections.title: Eligibility Criteria To Apply For The Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card

elements.body:
To be eligible to apply for the Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card, you should fulfil the following criteria:

  • You should be between 21 and 65 years of age.
  • Stable source of monthly income.
  • You should belong to the credit cards sourcing cities of the bank.
  • Apart from these criteria, Standard Chartered Bank would also evaluate other aspects to assess your worthiness for the card.

sections.title: Documents Needed to Apply for the Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card

elements.body:
To apply for the Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card, you need to submit the following documents:

  • Identity proof

One of the following:

      • Passport
      • Aadhaar card
      • Voter id card
      • PAN card
      • Government ID
  • Address proof

Aadhaar card and one of the following if your current residence address is not same as your Aadhaar address:

      • Driving license
      • Passport
      • Rental agreement
      • Phone bill
      • Electricity or any other utility bill
      • Your latest other bank's statement or credit card statement
  • Recent passport-sized photograph
  • Financial documents:
    • If you are a salaried individual - Your latest one month pay slip.
    • If you are a businessman - Your latest IT returns document with computation of your income or certified financials and continuity proof of your last business.
    • If you are a self-employed professional - The latest IT returns and continuity proof of your business. Or you can also apply for the card on the basis of your other bank credit card statement

sections.title: How To Apply online for The Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card

elements.body:
To apply for the card, visit the official Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card website and click on the 'Apply Now' option.

Enter the information asked for and click on 'Proceed'. You would be contacted by the bank representatives who would help you in initiating the application process.

faq.title: Faqs On Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card

items.question: What would be the minimum amount due on my Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Credit Card?
items.answer: The monthly minimum amount due on your card would be the higher of the following amounts - a) 5% of the statement outstanding or b) the sum total of all the installments billed, fees, interests, over limit amount, and 1% of the principal or Rs.250.

items.question: What's the grace period that I enjoy on my Super Value Titanium Card?
items.answer: Depending on the payment due date on your card, the grace period can vary from 18-48 days to 25-55 days.

items.question: How do I pay my Standard Chartered Super Value Titanium Card bill?
items.answer: To pay your credit card bill, you have multiple online and offline methods. The online payment methods include online banking, bill desk, NEFT, Visa money transfer, Electronic Clearing Service (ECS), etc. On the other hand, the offline payment ways include cheques, draft, and cash payment.

items.question: Can I get an add-on card with my Super Value Titanium Card?
items.answer: Yes, you can certainly apply for an add-on card of your Super Value Titanium Card. Please note that there wouldn't be any separate limit on the add-on card.

items.question: Can I revise the credit limit on my Super Value Titanium Card?
items.answer: Yes, you can request the bank to revise the credit limit on your card. The bank, after reviewing your credit card repayment behaviour, would decide on the new credit limit.

elements.body:
Standard Chartered Bank is the biggest multinational bank in our country and has 99 offices peppered in 42 cities. It has been running a successful and reputed business here since 1858. The name Standard Chartered originated from the names of the two banks that partnered to form this bank in the year 1969- The Chartered Bank of India, Australia and China, and Standard Bank of British South Africa.

Standard Chartered PLC, as a British worldwide banking and financial services conglomerate with its base in London, has a wide network of over 1700 sub offices, associates and partnership ventures all over the world. It is an international bank that functions in individual, corporate as well as organized banking arena. In spite of its UK base, it is ironical that over 90 percent of the bank's profits are from Asia and Africa. Standard Chartered bank's Platinum Rewards Credit Card presents you with plenty of attractive features and saving options.

sections.title: Features of SC Platinum Rewards Credit Card:

elements.body:
• If you use this card to pay for fuel in any petrol bunk in the country, you can earn redeemable cash points which either translates to rebates or cash return.
  • This card is perfect for those looking to lead an epicurean life no matter where they go. Get attractive discounts or earn points when you stay at premier hotels, dine at your favourite restaurants or food joints- both in the country and abroad.

sections.title: Benefits of SC Platinum Rewards Credit Card:

elements.body:
• You will also get two cash points every time you spend INR. 150 using your card anywhere. These accrued points can be used for some real big purchase or to pay back the balance amount due in your card.
  • You also get to enjoy a gamut of opulent lifestyle perks. A great range of unrivalled value for money offers when you go for vacations, golfing, movies, events and more awaits you.

sections.title: Eligibility Criteria and Documentation:

elements.body: You should be an Indian resident aged at least 18 to apply for a Standard Chartered Credit card. Also, applicants will be asked to submit an ID proof, a proof of address and other income related documents while applying for the loan.

sections.title: Fees & Other Charges:

elements.body:
• The joining fee for this credit card is INR. 399.
  • The annual membership fee is waived off for the initial year.
  • And from the second year onwards, the yearly membership renewal fee would be INR. 750.
  • There shall be no additional fees.
  • If you are applying for multiple cards for your family members' (those above age 18), INR. 750 is levied per card.
  • If you spend more than you're allowed credit limit, an overlimit fee of INR. 500 per one transaction or 2.5 percent of the over limit sum will be charged.

sections.title: Interest Charges:

elements.body:
Standard Chartered Platinum Rewards Credit Card customarily let go off interest charges if the amount due is paid completely within the agreed time frame every month. But they do levy full interest on the whole unsettled balance amount from the day of your purchase if the entire due amount is not paid.

  • For Statement Outstanding amount less than or equal to INR. 500 – INR. 100
  • For Statement Outstanding amount between INR. 501 and INR. 2000 – INR. 350
  • For statement outstanding amount between INR. 2001 and INR. 5000 – INR. 500
  • For statement outstanding amount between INR. 5001 and INR. 10,000 – INR. 600
  • For statement outstanding amount greater than INR. 10,000 – INR. 700

faq.title: SCB Platinum Rewards Credit Card FAQs:

items.question: Can I apply for a supplementary card?
items.answer: Yes, you can apply for a supplementary card online. However, all add-on cards come with separate annual fee and renewal fees.

items.question: What should I do if I accidentally misplace or lose my card?
items.answer: You can reach Standard Chartered's 24/7 help desk to instantly block the card. You will be free from any fraudulent transactions made using the card after you have blocked it.

items.question: What can I submit as the income proof?
items.answer: You can submit your latest payslips and income tax return statements as income proof.

items.question: What lifestyle benefits do I get with this card?
items.answer: Cardholders stand to get exclusive offers on dining, golfing, movie tickets and holidays.

items.question: What will be the card replacement fee?
items.answer: In case of loss of card or if it has to be replaced for some other reason, a replacement charge of INR. 250 is levied.

elements.body:

  • 4 skyward miles for every INR 150 spent

sections.title: Standard Chartered Emirates Platinum Credit Card Overview:

elements.body: Specially designed for the people who enjoy the sublime things in life, Standard Chartered Emirates Platinum credit card will offer both luxury and value. Skyward miles are offered on every purchase made using the card. Cardholders can use the miles to buy free tickets and for ticket upgrades. Unique benefits like priority pass membership and travel insurance coverage makes this card the best choice for a frequent flyer.

sections.title: Standard Chartered Emirates Platinum Credit Card Benefits:

elements.body:
This card comes with a special rewards scheme that will make every journey more pleasant. Here's a list of benefits that come with this card.

  • Sky-High Benefits

    • Cardholders get access to "Skywards”, Emirates Airline's frequent flyer scheme.

  • Priority Pass

    • With the priority pass membership that comes with the card, customers can access over 600 VIP airport lounges across the globe.

  • Travel Insurance Coverage

    • Emirates Platinum card offers a comprehensive travel insurance coverage of up to Rs.10 million.

sections.title: Standard Chartered Emirates Platinum Card Features:

elements.body:
• Cardholders earn 4 skyward miles for every Rs.150 billed to the card.
  • As a welcome gift, cardholders are offered 27,500 bonus miles which can be redeemed for free tickets and upgrades.
  • Skyward Miles come with no blackout dates. You can use the Miles to get discounts on Emirate flight tickets. Also, you can avail lifestyle, travel and shopping offers using Miles.
  • Cardholders get access to personalized "My Account” portal to manage all recent transactions and check Miles.

sections.title: Eligibility and Documentation for SCB Emirates Platinum Card:

elements.body:
• The applicant should be aged at least 21 and not more than 65 at the time of application.
  • The applicant should have a stable monthly income and should be residing in the location where the bank sources the credit card.
  • An identity proof, an address proof and one recent passport sized photograph will be asked for during application.
  • As income proof, salaried applicants should submit the latest salary slip and self-employed businessmen should submit the latest Income Tax returns statement and business continuity proof.

sections.title: Fees and Charges:

elements.body:
• No joining fee is charged for this card. The annual fee for one membership year is Rs. 13,999.
  • From the second membership year, a renewal fee of Rs. 13,999 will be charged annually.
  • Cardholders get 27,500 bonus Skyward Miles upon enrolment and renewal.
How to Redeem Skyward Miles?

Cardholders can utilize the Miles accumulated on their card to avail discounts on flights and also to upgrade the class. Cardholders can book a rewards ticket in every class of travel, anywhere on the Emirates. Also, Miles can be used to upgrade from Economy class to Business class or Business Class to First Class. Miles can also be redeemed against discount vouchers from participating stores.

sections.title: How to Apply for Standard Chartered Emirates Platinum Credit Card?

elements.body: In the homepage of BankBazaar, select the credit cards option from the top header. In the Credit Cards section, you will be able to explore various credit cards and also check your eligibility for selected cards. Based on your interests and requirements, BankBazaar will display a list of cards that match your requirements. You can also apply instantly for a card using the "Apply” option and filling in your personal details.

items.question: As documentation proof, can I give my other credit card's statement?
items.answer: Yes. You can apply on the basis of other bank credit card and also using life insurance policy documents.

items.question: How long will Standard Chartered take to process my application for Emirates Platinum credit card?
items.answer: If all the required documents are submitted, your application will be processed in 7 to 12 days.

items.question: How do I make the credit card payments?
items.answer: You can make the payment through online banking, ECS, NEFT transaction, VISA money transfer or cheque payment.

items.question: What should I do if my card is accidentally misplaced or stolen?
items.answer: You should immediately file a complaint with Standard Chartered. You can use the toll free number or visit the nearest branch for the same.

items.question: What is the credit limit for this card?
items.answer: Credit limit is decided based on factors like income and credit history. It is not a permanent figure and will change depending on your card usage and repayment history.

The Inner circle Platinum Card offered by Standard Chartered combines the special benefits of a Platinum card with the unmatched privileges of a unique loyalty program. sections.title: Standard Chartered Bank Inner Circle Platinum Card Benefits:

elements.body:
This card comes with a multitude of exclusive privileges and reward offers to cater to the lifestyle needs of the cardholder. Some of the benefits are listed below.

  • Free for Life

    • The Inner Circle Platinum Credit Card comes with no annual charges and is free for life.

  • Cash Back at all Auchan Stores

    • Cardholders stand to get 5% cash back for all spends made at Auchan stores.

  • Reward Points

    • When purchases are made at Lifestyle and affiliated stores, reward points are offered. The reward points can be redeemed at all Inner Circle stores.

  • Discount Vouchers

sections.title: Standard Chartered Inner Circle Platinum Credit Card Features:

elements.body:
Specially designed for the lifestyle needs of an avid shopper, this card combines the advantages of a platinum card with that of a rewarding lifestyle card. Read on to find more about the exciting features that come with this card.

  • For every Rs.100 spent at Lifestyle and other stores that are affiliated to Inner Circle, cardholders can earn up to 9 reward points.

  • All Inner Circle Platinum cardholders enjoy 5% cash back at all Auchan stores across India.
  • As a welcome gift, discount coupons worth Rs. 2,500 is awarded to the cardholders upon joining the Inner circle program.

faq.title: SCB Inner Circle Platinum Credit Card FAQs:

items.question: What will be the credit limit for Inner Circle Platinum card?

items.question: Can I get an add-on card?

items.question: Can I use my card to make purchases overseas?

items.question: I am a self-employed applicant. What can I submit as the income proof?
items.answer: Self-employed professionals need to submit the latest Income Tax returns statement and a business continuity proof.

items.question: What will be the renewal fee and annual fee for this card?
items.answer: This card is free for lifetime and you will not be charged any annual or renewal fees.

elements.body:
Citi PremierMiles Credit Card

This card is one of the most popular airline credit cards because it offers complimentary air travel. Citi PremierMiles Credit Card offers air miles, which cardholders can redeem for hotel bookings, car rentals and flight bookings. It also provides them with free access to selected airport lounges.

Fee Charges of Citi PremierMiles Credit Card:
  • Annual Fee - Rs.3,000. This fee is waived off for Citi Priority customers
  • Interest Rate - Between 37.2% p.a. and 42% p.a.
Features and Benefits of Citi PremierMiles Credit Card:
  • Cardholders will receive 10,000 Miles on their first spend. To earn these miles they have to spend a minimum of Rs.1,000 within 60 days from the date of issue of the airline credit card

sections.title: How To Apply For Airline Credit Cards Online?

elements.body:
Two channels through which one can apply for airline credit cards online include applying through bank's website and through authoritative third party platforms such as BankBazaar. Below instructions will help you know the online application process for airline credit cards.

Apply through bank's website: Many banks accept online application for airline credit cards. You can visit the bank's website and check for the availability of the feature. If you find 'Apply' button on the airline credit card page, you can follow the steps mentioned below to apply for the credit card.

    Steps to apply for airline credit cards online
  • Visit the official website of the bank
  • Choose an airline credit card that matches your requirement
  • Click on 'Apply' button to visit the online application page
  • On the application page, enter all the required information in the designated fields
  • Double check the entered information before submitting the application.

On successful submission of the application, the system will generate an application reference number, which should be recorded for all future references.

Once the bank receives the application, it reviews the same and if your profile becomes eligible for the applied card, you will receive a call in 3-4 working days. The further application process will be informed to you over a phone call or through an e-mail.

Banks typically take 7-10 days to process a credit card application. If you have any queries meanwhile, you can use the application reference number to track your credit card application status online.

Apply through BankBazaar website: BankBazaar is an authorised third party financial service provider. By partnering with more than 50 banks, the company offers a comprehensive platform to shop, compare and apply for financial products including credit cards, all under one umbrella. If you're confused about choosing a credit card, you can visit the website, go through the various credit cards listed on the site, choose the one that suits your needs and apply for it on the same platform. Mentioned below is the process to apply for an airline credit card through BankBazaar.

    Steps to apply for an airline credit card through BankBazaar
    • Go to bankbazaar.com
    • From the main menu, select 'Credit Cards'
    • The credit card page will display list of airline credit cards. You can choose one based on your travel needs
    • Beside the shortlisted card, you can find 'Check Eligibility' option. Click on the same and check your eligibility by providing the required details
    • If your profile is eligible for the chosen card, you will be taken to online application page, where you need to fill all the required details and click on 'Submit'
    • On successful submission of the application, the screen will display an 'Application ID', which should be retained for all future queries

BankBazaar also offers 'Track Application' feature through which you can check your credit card application status online.

sections.title: Eligibility For Airline Credit Cards

elements.body:
Each credit card issuer sets a different eligibility criteria based on the card and applicant type. Mentioned below is the basic eligibility required to apply for an airline credit card.

  • Applicant should be an Indian citizen
  • Salaried or self-employed professional or self-employed business-holder
  • Should have a decent credit history (Not applicable for first time borrowers)
  • Minimum age of the applicant should be 21 years and maximum age is 60 years

sections.title: Benefits Of Airline Credit Cards

elements.body:
For frequent travellers, having an airline credit card is like having a special privilege that provides various complimentary benefits throughout their trip. Exclusively designed for air travellers, airline credit cards come with many useful features and benefits including complimentary air miles, discounts at hotels, dining and others, free airport lounge visits, etc.

Let's have a look at the common benefits offered by airline credit cards.
  • Earn air miles: All the airline related transactions done using an airline credit card will earn air miles which can be redeemed for purchasing tickets on both domestic and international airlines.  
  • Bonus miles: It could be as a welcome gift or a renewal gift, credit card issuers typically offer bonus miles within a few days of card issuance. The miles can be encashed in the form of airline tickets during your next travel.
  • Accelerated miles: What's more fun than earning more reward points. With the accelerated miles programme, some credit cards offer accelerated miles on certain transactions. Make sure you're aware of the transactions eligible for accelerated rewards to make the most of the programme.
  • Airport lounge access: Sit back and relax in the airport lounges in times of delayed flights with the complimentary lounge visits offered by airline credit cards. The access is limited to select airports in India and in abroad. Cardholders need to display their credit cards at the eligible airport lounges and can enjoy the refreshments, internet facility and amenities offered by the lounges.
  • Fuel surcharge waiver: Of the other benefits offered by airline credit cards, fuel surcharge waiver is something useful even for less frequent travellers. Every time, you purchase fuel using an airline credit card, the fuel surcharge, which is typically charged on all card transactions at fuel stations, will be waived. Cardholders can thus enjoy fuel savings using an airline credit card.

sections.title: Documents Required To Apply For Airline Credit Cards

elements.body:
The required documents to apply for an airline credit card varies from one bank to another. Some basic documents required by many banks are mentioned below.

  • Copy of identity proof such as Aadhaar card, passport, etc.
  • Copy of PAN card
  • Two months salary slips or IT Returns
  • Copy of address proof document such as Voter's ID, Aadhaar, driving licence, electricity bill, passport, etc., whichever holds your current address
  • 1 passport size photograph
  • Duly signed in application

sections.title: What Kind Of Rewards Points Can Be Earned On Airline Credit Cards?

elements.body:
Airline credit cards are much helpful for those who travel often and are globetrotters. These cards besides providing regular credit card benefits provide exclusive features related to air travel. Complimentary lounge access to both domestic and international airports, priority check-in, extra baggage allowance and lot more.

Another interesting feature offered by airline credit cards is the reward points programme. Unlike the reward points programme on regular credit card, the reward points offered on airline credit cards will be accrued in the form of air miles. Each airline offer different air miles. For Instance, Jet Airways offers JPMiles, SpiceJet offers AirMiles, etc. The accrued air miles can be redeemed for flight bookings, to transfer seats from economy class to business class, and lot more.

Earning more air miles is also easy on airline credit cards as the card issuer offers accelerated rewards on specific spends that could help the cardholder to earn more air miles in less time.

sections.title: You may also like to read

elements.body:
Using credit cards to make your air travel economical

Many people dream of traveling by air but the high cost of flight tickets prevents them from fulfilling it.

To all such people credit cards can be a saviour. We are not saying using them would cut your flight expenses by half, but using them wisely would definitely reduce your expenses making your air travel economical.

Let us look at various ways to use your credit card to cut down your air travel expenses.

Choose right credit card: There are a variety of credit cards available in the market that would serve your specific needs. One such card is the Airline credit card which comes with a lot of benefits for those who fly often.

Credit card issuers compete hard to attract customers and to earn business by offering various sign-up bonuses. Choosing an Airline credit card that comes up with good sign-up bonuses would reward the customer with free air miles, discounted flight tickets and many more.

Accumulate more air miles: Just like how regular credit cards help you gain reward points every time you shop using a credit card, the Airline credit card offers the same benefit, but the reward points accumulated here are termed as air miles. The more you spend on your Airline credit card, the more air miles you accumulate.

Once you've gained enough miles, you can redeem them while booking your flight tickets or hotel rooms.

Sign up for frequent flyer memberships: Most airlines offer frequent flyer memberships, which would help the members to earn more air miles every time they fly. You can sign up for one or more airlines' frequent flyer membership programme, as it is completely free of cost, to avail the benefits. Some memberships allow you to earn miles on one airline and redeem them on any other airline. Hence, signing up for more than one membership will help you earn more air miles every time you fly.

Make use of airline promotions: Promotional offers by airlines are again a way to attract customers and to earn business in the most competitive airline space. You can take advantage of such promotional offers to make your air travel cheaper.

Some promotional programmes which offer air miles at affordable rates are the ones to grab as buying air miles at the original price is often expensive. Keep an eye on various promotional programmes offered by the airlines to make most out of it.

Earn from the airline partners: Airlines partner with other retailers such as food and beverage companies, apparels, hotels and many more. Knowing your airline partners and shopping from them will also bring you reward points. However, you need to be a member of the airline's frequent flyer programme to earn the rewards from its partners.

Now that you know how to make most of your credit card, get ready to fulfil your dream of flying high within your budget. Read more about

sections.title: What Is A Fuel Credit Card?

elements.body:
A Fuel Credit card is being offered by banks to customers in a bid to provide them with maximum benefit while purchasing fuel. Having this card enables those who constantly buy fuel for various purposes to lower the expenditure on fuel. Apart from that, it enables the users of Fuel Credit card to use it for other benefits with regards to lifestyle.

All About Fuel Credit Cards

sections.title: How To Apply For A Fuel Credit Card?

elements.body: An individual can apply for a Fuel Credit card by visiting the nearest branch of the bank from which he/she wants to avail the card or apply online. The applicant needs to fill the application form and provide the documents asked for to get himself/herself the Fuel Credit card and cut down on the fuel expenses.

sections.title: Who Are Eligible To Apply For A Fuel Credit Card?

elements.body:
The eligibility to apply for a fuel credit card seems to vary from bank to bank. However, some of the common eligibility norms that an applicant needs to fulfill are:

  • Need to have a good credit score.
  • Need to fulfill the minimum age and income bracket as prescribed by the bank.

sections.title: How To Choose The Best Fuel Credit Card?

elements.body:
Before deciding to avail the best Fuel Credit card one needs to consider quite a few things. And with different banks and financial institutions providing fuel credit cards it is not easy in finalizing the card that best suits the purpose of the individual. Here are certain things that an individual before deciding which fuel credit card to avail:

  • Credit card payment pattern: While choosing the best fuel credit card, the most important thing is to identify the pattern of payment. The individual must look for a card that offers fuel benefits as well as best interest rates.
  • Fuel spending pattern: The individual needs analyze his/her expenses and decide on the monthly budget that would be spent on fuel. This is quite important as availing a fuel credit card without analyzing this would not serve the purpose.
  • Fees and charges: Considering the fees and charges associated with the fuel credit card that one intends to get also needs to be assessed prior to availing the card. If this is not done, the benefits and discounts that come with fuel credit cards may be negated by virtue of paying high fees and charges that are associated with the card.
  • Check the redemption process of the card: It is better to check the redemption process of the fuel credit card. It is better to get those cards which offer instant redemption of points.

sections.title: Benefits Of Fuel Credit Cards

elements.body:
With many banks and financial institutions offering credit cards, the benefits that come with Fuel Credit cards differ. Apart from lowering the expenses with regards to purchasing fuel, some other benefits that come with Fuel Credit cards are as follows:

  • Get Reward Points
  • Redemption of points earned
  • Eligible for Cashback
  • Eligible for Surcharge Waiver
  • Dining offers
  • BookMyShow Offer
  • Eligible for Turbo Points
  • Waiver of Annual Fees
  • Can make utility bill payments
  • Eligible for Telecom benefits
  • Concierge Service

elements.title: Also Know Fuel credit cards with Cashback offers
elements.body: Cashback is one of the attractive and rewarding offers provided on fuel credit cards. In the time of rising petrol and diesel prices, having one fuel credit card with cashback feature is a saviour. You can receive the hiked petrol or diesel price as cashback by using a fuel credit card with cashback feature. Fuel credit cards also offer fuel surcharge waiver and accelerated reward points on fuel purchase which can be exchanged for both rewards and fuel purchases. One fuel credit card multiple savings, isn't it sounds amazing? Of course, yes.

sections.title: Features Of Fuel Credit Cards

elements.body:
Just like other credit cards, Fuel Credit cards also come with a lot of features. Some of the features that come with Fuel Credit cards which banks provide are as follows:

Listed below are a few credit card that offer cashback on fuel credit cards.
  • HDFC Bharat Cashback Credit Card and HDFC Bharat Credit Card offer 5% cashback on fuel purchases. No minimum transaction required but the maximum cashback is capped at Rs.150 per month.
  • ICICI Bank HPCL Coral Amex credit card, ICICI Bank HPCL Coral Visa/MasterCard and ICICI Bank HPCL Platinum credit card: All these cards offer 2.5% cashback on fuel purchases made at Hindustan Petrol pumps. The minimum transaction value should be Rs.500 and maximum cashback is capped at Rs.100 per month
  • Standard Chartered Titanium credit card offers 5% cashback on fuel spends at all petrol pumps. The minimum transaction should be Rs.750 and maximum discount is capped at Rs.250 per month
  • Can enjoy Zero Fuel Surcharge: An individual who uses Fuel Credit card gets the fuel surcharge of 2.5% waived when he/she purchases fuel by using the card. Apart from this, the card offers cashback as well as enables the cardholders to make payment of utility bills.
  • Individuals can redeem points to purchase fuel: By virtue of using the Fuel Credit cards at various outlets, an individual can earn redeem points. These redeem points can be used while purchasing fuel or for other lifestyle benefits like buying tickets, dining discounts etc.

sections.title: Why Opt For A Fuel Credit Card?

elements.body: When most credit cards that are existing in the market offer fuel benefits to individuals, the question emerges as to why one should opt for a Fuel Credit card. The answer to this question is that Fuel Credit cards are specially designed to save money every time an individual refills his vehicle with fuel. With petrol and diesel prices on the rise, Fuel Credit card can enable an individual to cut down on the expenses that go into buying fuel.

sections.title: Factors to Consider While Selecting the Best Fuel Credit Card:

elements.body:
Some of the factors that you should consider while selecting the best fuel credit card are as follows:

  • Savings – When you look for a fuel credit card, you should see how much you will end up saving on your fuel transactions.
  • Participating Oil Companies – This is one of the most important things that you should look at when you are looking for a fuel credit card. You should check if the benefits are offered at particular petrol pumps owned by a certain Oil Company or at all the petrol pumps across the country.
  • Surcharge Waiver – Figure out if you will receive fuel surcharge waiver on your fuel spends or not.
  • Spend Limits – Make sure the spend limit to avail benefits is not very high.
  • Annual Fee – Check the annual fee of the credit card that you plan to purchase. Some cards offer you an annual fee waiver when you spend a certain amount of money using your card in a year.
  • Redemption Process – Check out the redemption process of the credit card you plan to purchase. See if it offers instant redemption or not. Most cards offer instant redemption of points at petrol pumps.

elements.body: Lifestyle credit cards are one of the most popularly procured credit cards in India. As the name suggests, the cards work to enhance the cardholder's lifestyle choices with respect to food, dining, shopping, and so on. Lifestyle credit cards offer a number of perks that match the lifestyle requirements of the consumers.

sections.title: Lifestyle Credit Cards available

elements.body:
HDFC Bank Diners Club Black Credit Card

A credit card with one of the best Reward programs,HDFC Bank Diners Club Black credit card offers a number of benefits regarding dining, travel and golf. This lifestyle credit card comes with a plethora of benefits and features.

Features of the HDFC Bank Diners Club Black credit card

  • Customers can apply for an insurance protection through thesen HDFC Bank Diners Club credit card to avail air accident coverage that is worth Rs.2 crore, emergency medical expense coverage that is worth upto Rs.50 lakhs, credit liability coverage that is worth Rs.9 lakhs and travel insurance coverage that is worth up to Rs.55,000 in case of delay of baggage.
  • Customers can play an unlimited game of golf in around 20 golf courses across the country and over 40 courses throughout the world. Customers can also procure unlimited access to lessons for no additional cost at certain Driving ranges.
  • Customers can utilise the Reward points that they would have gained to book air tickets or hotels on the Diners Club website. Each Reward point is worth Re.1. These points can also be redeemed for AirMiles wherein 1 Reward Point equals 0.7 air mile. Points can also be redeemed for against products in the Rewards Catalogue.
  • Customers of this HDFC credit card can gain access to airport lounges across the world through the Exclusive Lounge Program.
  • Cardholders can avail revolving credit facility on this credit card at a very economical rate of interest.
  • HDFC Bank provides one of the lowest mark up on foreign currency transactions that are made using the Diners Club Black credit card.
  • Cardholders can procure a waiver on fuel surcharge if they spend an amount between rs.400 to Rs.1,00,000 on their fuel using their Diners Club Black credit card.

HDFC Bank Regalia First Credit Card

One of HDFC's unique credit card offerings, the HDFC Regalia First credit card offers a plethora of exciting benefits and privileges.

Features of the HDFC Bank Regalia First Credit Card

  • Cardholders can procure access to over 850 airport lounges across the world at no additional cost. At these lounges, customers can avail facilities such as phone, internet, fax and even conference rooms. In case the customer is a principal cardholder, they can avail four accesses every year to the priority pass airport lounge at no additional cost.
  • Cardholders can also use their Regalia First credit card and allow their guests to enjoy special facilities at airport lounges at a nominal fee of $27. Customers should note that the usage charges for lounges may vary from one lounge to another.
  • Every time a cardholder spends Rs.150 on their card, they can earn 4 Reward Points. Every time they book using the HDFC Regalia website, they can earn twice the Reward points. Customers can also earn twice the Rewards Points when they spend on restaurants that are stand-alone, on dining.
  • Reward points can be earned for all travel and entertainment booking if done through the HDFC Regalia website. These Reward points can be redeemed for a host of exciting gifts and offers available in the Rewards Catalogue by HDFC.
  • Reward points earned by customers can also be exchanged for AirMiles which can be be used for both international as well as domestic flights.
  • Cardholders can procure comprehensive insurance coverage against a number of risks. In case of an air accident, the nominated member of the cardholder will receive a sum of Rs.50 lakh. In case there is a medical emergency situation when the cardholder is abroad, Rs.10 lakh can be availed as emergency insurance cover. Customers should note that the claim documents will have to be sent to the HDFC Ergo General Insurance Company that is situated in Noida.

JetPrivilege HDFC Bank Diners Club Credit Card

Combining the best of both Jet Airways and Diners Club along with the best of offers from HDFC, the JetPrivilege HDFC Bank Diners Club Credit Card allows customers to enjoy numerous benefits on dining out and flight bookings with Jet Airways. Made for those who have a taste for the luxurious, this card is perfect for frequent travellers.

Features of JetPrivilege HDFC Bank Diners Club Credit Card

  • Cardholders, upon procuring this card will receive a welcome gift wherein they receive 15 JetPrivilege Tier Points on the first swipe of their card within the first 3 months of getting the card. Customers will have to be a member of the JetPrivilege Frequent Flier Club or will have to enroll in this programme during the time of receiving their credit card.
    • Membership Tier can be upgraded or maintained through the JetPrivilege Tier Points that is earned through credit card spends on flight bookings.
  • Customers can earn up to 30,000 Bonus JPMiles which can be converted to flight bookings as well. Customers receive 15,000 JPMiles on the first swipe of their card within 90 days of receiving it. Another 15,000 JPMiles on a retail expense of Rs.1.5 lakh or over within the first 3 months.
  • Cardholders receive a discount voucher that is worth Rs.750 and a waiver of the base fare when they book their return ticket through the Jet Airways website. Once the membership fee has been paid, welcome benefits can be availed.
  • When cardholders renew their credit card, they can earn 10,000 JPMiles and 5 JetPrivilege Tier Points when they swipe their card within 90 days of renewal. Cardholders will also receive a discount voucher that is worth Rs.750 and a waiver of the base fare when they book their return ticket through the Jet Airways website.
  • For every Rs.150 spent on retail purchases, customers can earn 8 JPMiles and on every Rs.150 spent on flight bookings made through Jet Airways website, customers stand to earn 24 JPMiles. A green fee waiver on unlimited golf games can be availed at a number of golf courses around the world and in India.
  • Customers can avail a 24/7 Concierge Service through their JetPrivilege HDFC Bank Diners Club Credit Card who can take care of various services such as golf course reservation and referral, dining reservation and referral, gift and flower delivery, limousine referral and car rentals, hotel reservation and rental along with courier and business services.
  • Primary cardholders can avail access to more than 600 airport lounges around the globe including India.
  • JetPrivilege Tier Points can be availed every time customers use their credit card on purchases other than fuel. Once these purchases cross Rs.1.5 lakh, they will receive 1 JetPrivilege Tier Point.
  • Customers receive a concession of 5% on all domestic air tickets when the purchase is made through the Jet Airways website once they enter the promo code 'JTHDFC' when they check out.
  • Customers can procure a discount of up to 15% on food and beverage bills at numerous fine dining restaurant across the country.
  • Through HDFC Classic Banking, customers can avail a dedicated personal banker, benefits for family, relationship pricing, exclusivity with classic branding debit card and cheque books among others.
  • In case cardholders have a savings account with a minimum quarterly average balance of Rs.1 lakh, the following benefits can be availed -
    • EXTRA JPMiles programme wherein additional JPMiles can be earned when credit card is used at outlets of one of Jet Airways' partners.
    • Fuel surcharge waiver.
    • No liability if cardholders lose or misplace their credit card as long as the loss is reported immediately to the 24 hour customer care centre.
    • Customers can avail revolving credit on their JetPrivilege HDFC Bank Diners Club credit card at a rate of interest of 1.99% per month.
    • Interest free credit can also be procured.

Axis Bank Privilege Credit Card

This premium credit card by Axis Bank provides customers with a number of travel related benefits along with loyalty privileges that have been accorded to cardholders. Air miles, lounge access at airports and other exclusive offers on fuel and entertainment can also be availed in Axis Bank Privilege Credit Card

Features of Axis Bank Privilege Credit Card

  • Travel vouchers worth Rs.5000 can be availed as a Welcome gift when customers enroll as privilege cardholder. These vouchers can be redeemed on Yatra.com wherein flight tickets can be booked for both domestic as well as international trips along with bs tickets. Holidays and hotels can also be booked.
    • In order to procure this gift, customers will have to swipe the privilege card thrice within a period of 2 months from receiving it. Vouchers will be added to the cardholder's account as 2 vouchers, both worth Rs.2,500. These vouchers will be valid for a period of 4 months from the day they receive it.
  • Every time cardholders spend Rs.2.5 lakh on their credit card, they can receive Yatra travel vouchers worth Rs.5,000. These vouchers can be redeemed against the eDGE Reward points that has been earned through credit card spends.
  • The Axis Bank Privilege Credit card allows customers to gain access to airport lounges across the country, two times every 3 months, at no additional cost.
  • Cardholders are automatically enrolled into the eDGE loyalty rewards programme by Axis Bank. Each time they spend Rs.200 using their credit card, they receive 10 points. Expenses can be both domestic as well as international.
  • When customers use their Axis Bank Privilege credit card at dining establishments throughout the country that have partnered up with Axis Bank, they can receive a discount of up to 15%.
  • Cardholders can use their credit card to purchase movie tickets through FastTicket.in or the application and receive one ticket for free, that is worth a maximum of Rs.200. This offer can be availed once a month to every cardholder. Reward Points cannot be procured on these purchases.
  • Customers can avail a waiver on fuel surcharge when they purchase fuel between Rs.400 to Rs.4000. The maximum refund that can availed is Rs.400 per month.
  • Customers can avail free insurance cover through their Axis Bank Privilege credit card.

Kotak Bank PVR Platinum Credit Card

The PVR Platinum credit card by Kotak Mahindra Bank is meant for all movie buffs and those who live for the extravaganza that movies provide. When customers pay for their purchases through their Kotak PVR Platinum credit card, they can avail upto 2 PVR movie tickets every month, for free. When they spend over Rs.7,500 per month, they will receive Coupon Codes that can redeemed for free PVR movie tickets that can used for any show, across every cinema.

Features of Kotak Bank PVR Platinum Credit Card

  • Cardholders can avail 2 PVR movie tickets at no additional cost every month if they spend Rs.7,500 or over, during a monthly billing cycle.
  • Customers can shop in outlets across the country using their PVR Kotak Credit Card and procure complimentary movie tickets from PVR. This offer is available throughout the year.
  • The Kotak Bank add-on card will have every feature of the principal card and the principal cardholder can set the limit on his/her credit add-on card.
  • Customers can enjoy the PVR Shield free insurance cover which will protect cardholders in case of loss or theft of their card or if unauthorized transactions are made. The amount that is insured is Rs.75,000 per year on both primary as well as supplementary cards.

sections.title: Benefits Of Lifestyle Credit Cards

elements.body:
If you're looking for a credit card that provides whole lot of benefits covering major areas of your life, then you should ideally go for a lifestyle credit card. With changing lifestyles and preferences, credit card issuers are adding more and more privileges to offer credit cards with comprehensive lifestyle benefits.

A detailed look at the kind of benefits offered by lifestyle credit cards would help you understand the cards better.

Travel savings: With travel becoming an essential part of modern day life, a lifestyle credit card would certainly include a benefit related to travel. It could be in the form of offering complimentary air miles, discounts on air tickets booking, hotel booking, membership to frequent flyer programmes, etc. You will also be allowed to redeem reward points for plane tickets, hotel bookings, etc.

Dining privileges: Dining out has become an integral part of our lifestyle. People will be eagerly waiting for the weekends to explore new dining destinations every week. To provide exclusive benefit to all such foodies, lifestyle credit cards would certainly offer privileges on dining spends including discounts at partner restaurants across India, cashback at certain restaurants, complimentary dishes, chance to become a chef and lot more.

Airport lounge access: As part of the travel benefit, lifestyle credit cards also offer complimentary access to airport lounges at both domestic and international airports located across India. Cardholders can also get complimentary membership to various priority pass programmes that in turn provide exclusive lounge visits, benefits to add-on cardholders.

Health and wellness benefits: As health and wellness play a key role in our day-to-day life, a few lifestyle credit cards do provide related benefits by partnering with healthcare and wellness professionals.

Concierge services: Vacation in a foreign land is not as easy as it is in our own country. Unless, everything is booked and planned, we cannot make memories out of the trip. With lifestyle credit cards offering exclusive concierge services, all your booking needs will be taken care, while you enjoy your vacation. Some of the services included in concierge service are dining referral and reservation, gift delivery assistance, car rental referral and assistance, hotel referral and booking assistance, and other business services.

Savings on fuel spends: One compulsory expense most of us have on a weekly basis is fuel purchase. Due to the fuel surcharge levied on card transactions, many of us tend to make payments in cash. With lifestyle credit cards, we can avoid paying the surcharge, as it is being waived by most of the credit cards when used to make fuel transactions.

Movie ticket offers: After travel, entertainment plays an important part to make us feel refreshed. To cover this aspect, lifestyle credit cards offer various discounts on movie tickets and other entertainment programmes. It could be a buy one, get one movie ticket or a special discount on ticket price, cardholders can plan their weekend movie at much lesser price.

Insurance cover: One interesting aspect of lifestyle credit cards is the comprehensive insurance protection. Most cards offer coverage for air accidental death, emergency hospitalisation abroad, loss of card, loss of travel documents, loss of check-in baggage, etc.

sections.title: How To Apply For Lifestyle Credit Cards Online?

elements.body:
Applying for a lifestyle credit card is simple and easy with the online application process. Once you have selected the credit card that matches your lifestyle requirements, you can visit the bank's website, go to the lifestyle credit card page and find the 'Apply' option to submit an online application.

Once the bank receives the application, it reviews the same and if your profile matches the eligibility, you will receive a call in 3-4 working days. The further application process will be informed to you. Banks typically take 7-10 days to process a credit card, provided the applicant clears all the verification checks.

sections.title: Eligibility For Lifestyle Credit Cards

elements.body: The eligibility for lifestyle credit cards is different for different cards. Hence, it is recommended to check the bank's website to know the eligibility criteria specific to the bank and the credit card.

sections.title: Documents Required To Apply For A Lifestyle Credit Card

elements.body:
Some basic documents required to apply for a lifestyle credit card are provided below. However, banks may request for some other documents based on the card type.

  • Copy of identity proof such as Aadhaar card, passport, Voter's ID etc.
  • Copy of address proof document such as Voter's ID, Aadhaar, driving licence, electricity bill, passport, etc., whichever holds your current address
  • PAN card copy
  • Two months salary slips or IT Returns
  • Duly signed in application
  • 1 passport size photograph

sections.title: Top Shopping Credit Cards in India

offers.title: SBI SimplySave Credit Card
offers.body:
The SimplySAVE credit card offered by SBI is best suited for those who conduct their day to day transactions on credit cards. By offering accelerated rewards on popular spending categories such as grocery, movies, dining, etc., the credit card offers maximum benefits.

offers.title: Kotak Bank Delight Platinum Credit Card
offers.body:

sections.title: Types Of Shopping Credit Cards In India

elements.body:
Shopping has been an all-time past time for most of us. Whether there is an occasion or not, we tend to shop as and when we feel like having some new stuff. Whether we shop purposefully or impulsively, we never stop doing it. And those SALE day offers and Black Friday sales make us even more exciting. What if we get such kind of deals throughout the year? It sounds little exaggerated, but with right kind of shopping tools we can make every purchase exciting.

Cashback shopping credit cards: The name says it all. Cashback shopping credit cards will bring you back a percentage of transaction amount as cashback. The amount of cashback varies from one retailer to another. If you are loyal to one or more brands, you can search for credit cards that offer cashback on that particular brand.

Shopping credit cards with accelerated rewards: These shopping credit cards may not bring you instant luck but would surprise you with gifts and rewards. Unlike regular purchases, spends related to shopping on a few categories like apparel, accessories, cosmetics, etc., would bring you accelerated reward points which can be exchanged for gifts, discounts and other deals as offered by your bank.

Shopping credit cards with discount offers: Some shopping credit cards provide a year-round discount on purchases made at particular stores, either online or offline. If you frequently shop at a particular retail store, say Shoppers Stop, LifeStyle, Trends, etc., you can choose a credit card that offers discounts on spends related to that stores.

Besides the above-listed features, shopping credit cards offer complimentary gift vouchers, e-vouchers, annual fee reversal, and other exciting offers related to shopping.

sections.title: How To Apply For Shopping Credit Cards Online?

elements.body:
Applying for a shopping credit card or any credit card has become easy with the online application process. You can choose the credit card that suits your lifestyle requirements and visit the online application page to apply for the same. Mentioned below are two different channels through which you can apply for a shopping credit card online.

Apply through bank's website

The first method is to apply through the respective bank's website. As most banks are accepting credit card applications online, you can initiate your application process using the online medium. Follow the below steps to apply for a shopping credit card through a bank's website.

Steps to apply for a shopping credit card online
  • Visit the respective bank's website
  • Look for your preferred shopping credit card
  • Click on the card to access detailed information about the card
  • Click on 'Apply' button to submit an online application for the same
  • On the online application page, fill all the required fields with accurate information, read the terms and conditions before accepting and click on 'Submit'

The system will generate an application reference number on successful submission of the application. The bank will take 3-4 days to review the application and if the details meet the eligibility criteria, you will receive a call informing you about further steps in the application process.

If everything goes well, the bank will take 7-10 days to process the credit card. You can track the status of your application using the application ID through the bank's website.

sections.title: Apply Through Bankbazaar Website

elements.body:
The second and equally authorised channel to apply for a shopping credit card is through BankBazaar website. BankBazaar is a partner service provider to more than 50 banks and offers a comprehensive platform to shop for credit cards and other financial products.

You can find shopping credit cards offered by different banks under one roof, enabling you to compare and choose the best card in the market. Further, you can apply for the same on BankBazaar website. Mentioned below are the steps to apply for a credit card through BankBazaar website.

Steps to apply for a shopping credit card through BankBazaar
  • Visit Bankbazaar.com
  • Select 'Credit Cards' from the main menu
  • Find your shopping credit card from the list of credit cards
  • Check your eligibility for the card by providing some basic details such as your name, location, income details, etc.
  • If your profile is eligible for the credit card, you will be redirected to online application page. Fill all the required fields with relevant data and click on 'Submit'

    • The system will generate an Application ID, which can be later used to track the status of your application using BankBazaar's 'Track Application' facility.

sections.title: Eligibility To Apply For Shopping Credit Cards

elements.body:
The basic eligibility required to apply for a shopping credit card is provided below. The eligibility guidelines may not be the same for all the banks and all the credit cards. Hence, it is recommended to check with the bank for specific eligibility details.

  • Applicant should be a citizen of India
  • Salaried or self-employed
  • Should have a decent credit history (Not applicable for first time borrowers)
  • Age of the applicant – Min. 21 years and Max. 60 years

sections.title: Documents Required To Apply For Shopping Credit Cards

elements.body:
The documents required to apply for shopping credit cards are mentioned below. Again, since each bank has a different requirement, for bank specific documentation, you need to check with the bank or its website.

  • Copy of identity proof such as Aadhaar card, passport, etc.
  • Copy of address proof document such as Voter's ID, Aadhaar, driving licence, electricity bill, passport, etc., whichever holds your current address
  • PAN card copy
  • Two months salary slips or IT Returns
  • Duly signed in application
  • 1 passport size photograph

Premium credit cards offer the best of the lifestyle privileges and benefits that you can't expect from a regular card. A few high-end facilities offered by such cards are free lounge access to domestic and international airports and an exclusive reward points program.

Also, to redeem the reward points, these cards offer equally exciting redemption options across a diverse range of first-rate products and services. Another attraction of most of these cards is the set of special services by a dedicated concierge.

sections.title: How to apply For The Premium Credit Cards?

elements.body:
You can apply for any of the credit cards listed here on the BankBazaar website. Not only this, you can even upload the necessary documents on the website and thus enjoy faster processing of your credit card application.

Other advantages of applying for credit cards on the BankBazaar website are the free chance that you get to check your credit score, the free chance that you get to check your eligibility for your desired cards, free gifts, etc.

Apply for the card on BankBazaar through the following steps:

  • Click on 'Check Eligibility' placed next to your desired card.
  • Verify your eligibility for that credit card by answering the questions asked.
  • Now you would be redirected to the particular bank's credit card application page where you would have to provide answers to the questions asked.
  • Click 'Submit' and then you would be prompted to upload your documents.
  • Upload them and click on 'Submit'.

On submitting the application and the documents, an Application ID would be shared with you. This ID should be used when you want to know your application's status. Just visit 'Track Application' and enter your ID.

sections.title: Differences Between Premium And Non-premium (Regular) Credit Cards

elements.body:
Premium credit cards are loaded with certain types of features and benefits which separate them from the regular credit cards. The premium benefits in these cards also mean that the fees and charges for some of them might be higher than those of the regular cards.

If you are wondering about how to distinguish a premium card from a non-premium one, the following section would help you in your attempt.

Fees and charges:

The associated fees and charges are generally higher for the premium cards as compared to those of the regular ones. These include the joining fee, the renewal (annual) fee, etc.

Eligibility criteria:

  • In addition to the other criteria, to be eligible for the premium credit cards, you need to have a relatively high annual income which is above Rs.50,000 for most such cards.
  • On the other hand, there are regular cards which have an income criterion of as low as Rs.12,000 per month.

Joining bonus:

  • Most premium cards offer attractive joining bonus offers like reward points in bulk, complimentary air tickets, air miles, etc.
  • The regular credit cards either don't offer any joining bonus and even if some of them do, it's not very rewarding.

Reward points:

  • One primary advantage of premium cards is the privilege of a highly beneficial reward points program. You can earn points by using the card on multiple lifestyle and other categories.

Also, the accelerated reward points program in these cards allow you to earn RP in bulk which can be redeemed for premium products and services.

  • Although the regular cards also offer regular reward points and (a few of them even have accelerated programs), these are not as attractive as the ones offered by the premium cards.

Here, the reward points earned are low and the redemption options are also moderate.

Concierge services:

  • Most premium cards offer the special services of a dedicated concierge who would take care of all your travel bookings, hotel reservations, entertainment booking arrangement, and other such handy services.
  • But you are unlikely to enjoy these services in a regular credit card.

Lounge access:

  • With premium cards, you get complimentary and paid access to international and domestic airport/railway lounges through international programs like the Priority Pass membership.
  • For the regular cards, even if they offer lounge access, the number of visits would be fewer than the ones offered by the primary cards. Also, it would only be for domestic lounges and not the international ones.

Golf programs:

  • If you want to enjoy free golf sessions and lessons at domestic and international golf courses, you need to opt for premium credit cards.
  • This facility is hardly offered by any of the regular credit cards.

Milestone bonus:

  • For premium cards, if the annual spends on the card cross a certain amount as specified by the issuer, you get a certain large number of reward points as a bonus.
  • Although the milestone bonus exists in regular cards too, the quantity of reward points is not that high.

sections.title: Axis Bank Car Loan Eligibility

elements.body:
Salaried individual

  • The applicant must be at least 21 years of age, and the maximum age of eligibility being 70 years.
  • Net annual salary of Rs.2.4 lakh p.a.
  • The applicant must be employed for a minimum of 1 year.
  • The income eligibility criteria will depend on the Form 16 and the salary slip submitted.

Self-employed individuals

  • The minimum age of the applicant must be 18 years and the maximum age being 75 years.
  • The minimum net annual business must be Rs.18 lakh for selected car models, while for other models, the minimum net annual business income must be Rs.2 lakh.
  • The applicant must be employed for a minimum of 3 years.
  • The income eligibility criteria will depend on the latest income tax returns.

Self-employed non individuals

  • The minimum net annual business must be Rs.18 lakh for selected car models, while for other models, the minimum net annual business income must be Rs.2 lakh.
  • The applicant must be employed for a minimum of 3 years.
  • The applicant will have to furnish IT returns for at least 2 years along with the audited financials of 2 years along with the calculated income.

Priority customers

  • Customers with a vintage of 6 months.
  • The applicant must have an Average Quarterly Balance of Rs.1 lakh for the last 2 quarters.
  • The maximum loan amount that can be availed must be equivalent to 3 times the Average Quarterly Balance for the last 2 quarters.

sections.title: Factors affecting Axis Bank Car Loan eligibility

elements.body:
Some of the factors that affect Axis Bank Car Loan eligibility are given below:

  • Income: You will have to earn a minimum salary on a monthly basis in order to be eligible for the car loan scheme offered by Axis Bank. Higher your income, better are your chances of availing a car loan from Axis Bank.
  • Market fluctuation: Fluctuation in market also determines the interest rate that will be charged on your loan amount. The rate of interest may be higher if the inflation is high, and similarly can be lower if the inflation rate is lower. Hence, always check how the market is performing before availing a car loan.
  • Loan amount: The loan amount will determine the rate of interest levied. Higher the loan amount, higher will be the rate of interest.
  • Repayment tenure: The repayment tenure plays a role in the lender determining the rate of interest charged on the loan amount. Higher the repayment tenure, higher will be the interest rate charged and vice versa.
  • Income-to-debt ratio: The lender checks the income-to-debt ratio before deciding whether they should approve your car loan or not. The income-to-debt ratio is nothing but the ratio of your income to the debt you own. Hence, in order to avail a car loan at a lower interest rate, you must ensure that your income-to-debt ratio is low.
  • Relationship with your bank: Your relationship with the lender will also determine the rate of interest levied on the loan amount. It is always recommended that the applicant avails a car loan from the bank where he/she holds a bank account. The bank finds it easier to provide loan to a person who has been a customer of the bank for a very long time. Hence, there is a very good chance that the applicant will get a car loan at a lower interest rate.

sections.title: Car Loan Schemes offered by Axis Bank

elements.body:
The car loan schemes offered by Axis Bank are:

  • Axis Bank New Car Loan scheme: This scheme is suitable for those who wish to purchase a new car for themselves. The minimum loan amount that an individual can avail is Rs.1 lakh with the repayment tenure being up to 8 years.
  • Axis Bank Pre-Owned Car Loan scheme: Customers who wish to purchase a pre-owned car for themselves can avail this car loan from Axis Bank. The minimum loan amount that one can avail is Rs.1 lakh with the repayment tenure going up to 5 years.
  • Loan against car scheme: If you are in an urgent need of money, you can avail this scheme where you can offer your vehicle as a collateral in exchange for loan. The loan amount offered by the lender starts at Rs.10 lakh and up to 50% of the original value of the car.

sections.title: How to Calculate EMI on Axis Car Loan

elements.body:
Before you avail a car loan from Axis, you may want to know how much amount you will be paying towards the loan each month. This is simply known as EMIs or equated monthly instalments and it offers an easy way to repay your car loan. By calculating the Axis Bank Car Loan EMI , you will be able to budget your monthly expenses better.

You can calculate the EMI for your car loan by using the below-given formula:

E = P*r*[(1+r) ^n/((1+r) ^n-1)]

In the above formula, E denotes the EMI, P the principal amount, r the interest rate and n the number of years or tenure of the loan.

You can also calculate the EMI by using the EMI Calculator tool wherein you just need to enter the loan amount, interest rate, repayment tenure, processing fee, etc. The tool will calculate the EMI and display it to you.

items.question: Does Axis Bank allow part-payments?
items.answer: Yes, you can make a part-prepayment towards your car loan.

items.question: How to apply for an Axis Bank Car Loan?
items.answer:
A few channels through which you can apply for a car loan from Axis Bank are as follows:

  • Through the official website of the lender
  • Through a trusted third-party financial services website like BankBazaar
  • By directly visiting the nearest branch of the lender
  • It is easy to apply for a car loan online since you can complete the application process from anywhere and at any time. The process is completely secure, and your details will not be shared with other parties.

items.question: What is the maximum loan amount I can get with the help of an Axis Bank Car Loan?
items.answer: The maximum loan amount you can get from Axis Bank to buy a car will depend on your car loan eligibility criteria. The bank will also take into consideration the finance requirements, your income, and repayment capacity. A minimum of Rs.1 lakh and a maximum amount equal to 100% of the on-road price of the car can be availed.

items.question: Can I foreclose my car loan?
items.answer: Yes, you are allowed to pre-close your car loan. You can submit a request for foreclose at any Axis Bank loan centre.

items.question: Where can I get a car loan application form?
items.answer: The loan application form will be available at all branches of the lender. If you wish to apply for a car loan online, you will need to fill up and submit the online application form.

items.question: What is the process of loan verification?
items.answer:
After you have submitted your loan application and required documents, Axis Bank follows the procedure below:

  • Processing and approval of the application form
  • Verification of documentation
  • Sanctioning the loan
  • Disbursement of the loan

items.question: How long does the car loan process take?
items.answer: Axis Bank processes car loan applications in a timely manner, provided that you have submitted all the required documents. If the application form is incomplete or the documents needed for a proper appraisal have not been submitted by the customer, the lender may take longer to process the loan.

items.question: What security is acceptable to Axis Bank to get a car loan?
items.answer: In the case of Axis Bank car loan, the car will serve as security. You need to hypothecate the vehicle to the bank for the period of the loan. No other collateral is needed.

items.question: Do I need my credit score to apply for a car loan from Axis Bank?
items.answer: Since a car loan is a secured loan, your credit score might not be required. However, credit scores help get your loan approved and fetch you a good interest rate.

items.question: Can I cancel my loan application before it is sanctioned or disbursed?
items.answer: Yes, you are allowed to make a cancellation on your loan application. However, the bank may levy a penalty for the same.

Drive home with a Federal Car Loan. To know more, follow some simple steps given below to get attractive deals.

In an average Indian's life, owning a car is a major milestone. True, a while back, this was a luxury that would have been out of reach of a majority of Indians, but the situation has dramatically changed in the last few decades. Today, a car isn't a luxury- but is an essential component of modern living. And with friendly, customer centric car loan offerings from progressive institutions like the Federal Bank, more and more Indians are driving their own dream cars into the sunset. The Federal Bank Personal Car Loan is a comprehensive product, designed specifically for Indian customers.. The following article examines this dynamic product in detail, and helps you answer that primary question- 'Why apply for a Federal Bank Car Loan?'

sections.title: Introduction to Federal Bank Personal Car Loan

elements.body: Dating back to the pre-independence era, the Federal Bank has always been an influential and respected banking institution in the south of India. Headquartered in Kerala, and with an active presence across the country, the Federal Bank has earned a reputation as a very stable and customer centric banking organization. The personal car loan from Federal Bank is a very dynamic product, inclusive of a number of thoughtful features and attractive benefits. A simple application process, low EMIs and hassle free loan processing make this product stand out from the rest.

sections.title: Why Choose Federal Bank Personal Car Loan?

elements.body:
Purchasing a car is a big decision, which can have major financial implications. It is imperative that one chooses a car loan which does not strain his/her resources, while at the same time providing sufficient financial aid to purchase the car. As such Federal Bank's Personal Car Loan is extremely beneficial. One can get a loan which covers the entire cost (ex-showroom price) of a car model. The bank offers loans at extremely competitive rates, with personal accident insurance added as well.

This loan can be used to buy either a new car or a used car, with Federal Bank following a simple and hassle free procedure to sanction the loan.

sections.title: Features of Federal Bank Personal Car Loans

elements.body:
Some of the key features of the Personal Car Loan are highlighted below:

  1. Both resident Indians and NRIs can apply.
  2. It is possible to avail loans upto 100% of the ex-showroom price of the car.
  3. Low EMIs alongside very friendly car loan interest rate.
  4. Long repayment tenure of upto 7 years.
  5. Hassle free, transparent and fast loan application, processing and disbursement cycles.
  6. Loan can be used to buy either a new car or a used car.
  7. Limited documentation and simple terms and conditions.
  8. Personal accident insurance provided free of cost.
  9. No pre closure charges (for individuals).

sections.title: Eligibility Criteria for Federal Bank Personal Car Loan

elements.body:
An applicant, seeking the car loan offering from Federal Bank must satisfy the following conditions to qualify for this loan,

  1. The applicant must be a resident Indian or a documented NRI.
  2. He/she must not be younger than 21 years or older than 65 years at loan maturity.
  3. Both individuals and corporates can apply.
  4. The applicant must take home a minimum salary of Rs.7,500 after meeting all his loan EMI commitments.
  5. If the applicant's own numbers don't match up for eligibility, his/her spouse's income can also be clubbed into the equation. Also, income from agriculture/rental undertakings can also be clubbed with the regular income.
  6. n individual can club the income of his/her spouse to meet the minimum income criteria..
